msg_jp: 女子寮前。
msg_en: In front of the girls' dorm,

msg_jp: そこには、制服姿の鈴が立つ。
msg_en: stood Rin in her school uniform.

msg_jp: 寮母さんが隣に。
msg_en: Next to her was the dorm mother.

msg_jp: `寮母@「じゃ、お願いするわね」
msg_en: `Dorm Mother@❝All right, I'm leaving her to you.❞

msg_jp: これまでと同じ繰り返されてきた言葉だけど、今日だけは重圧を感じた。
msg_en: Though it was a stock line she gave me every morning, today her words seemed to carry extra weight.

msg_jp: 責任という名の。
msg_en: It was the weight of responsibility.

msg_jp: 寮母さんはそれだけ告げると、女子寮に消える。
msg_en: Without further ado, the dorm mother disappeared back into the dorm.

msg_jp: 鈴を見る。
msg_en: I looked Rin over.

msg_jp: 怯えたように立ちつくす。
msg_en: She was just standing there, frightened.

msg_jp: `理樹@「朝食だよ、鈴」
msg_en: `Riki@❝It's time for breakfast, Rin.❞

msg_jp: その手を引いて、歩き出す。
msg_en: I took her hand and set off.

msg_jp: 鈴を食堂に連れていく。
msg_en: We arrived at the cafeteria.

msg_jp: `理樹@「これからはここで食べるんだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝From today on, you'll have breakfast in here.❞

msg_jp: それぞれお盆を持って、テーブルに着く。
msg_en: We carried our trays to the table.

msg_jp: こんなにも混んでるのに、このテーブルだけは誰も座っていない。
msg_en: In spite of it being this crowded, there was no one sitting at this one table.

msg_jp: 僕らの指定席だったからだ。
msg_en: It was because those seats were reserved for us.

msg_jp: 謙吾も、真人もいなくなってしまったけど…。
msg_en: Even though Kengo and Masato weren't with us anymore...

msg_jp: `鈴@「食べないのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Aren't we gonna eat?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「ごめん、食べよう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Sorry, let's dig in.❞

msg_jp: 席につき、いただきますと手を合わせた。
msg_en: We both sat down at the table and began eating.

msg_jp: テーブルにふたりだけなのがよかったのか、鈴はいつも通りに食べていた。
msg_en: Apparently thanks to not having anyone else at the table, she was able to eat just as always.

msg_jp: その後、鈴を連れて、担任教師の元を訪れた。
msg_en: After breakfast, we visited our homeroom teacher.

msg_jp: そして鈴の口から復学したいと告げた。
msg_en: Rin told him she wanted to return to school.

msg_jp: 僕が席替えの件を付け加える。
msg_en: I asked him about our desk assignment.

msg_jp: 僕が鈴の隣の席まで移動することになった。
msg_en: And he allowed me to sit next to her in class.

msg_jp: `理樹@（真人と離れちゃうな…）
msg_en: `Riki@(Too bad that I have to part from Masato...)

msg_jp: でも今は鈴の隣にいよう。
msg_en: But I had to be with her now.

msg_jp: 僕は鈴とキャッチボールを続けながら、ひたすら考えた。
msg_en: I was thinking so hard while playing catch with Rin,

msg_jp: なんだかすべてが僕の妄想のような気もしてきた。
msg_en: that I was even starting to entertain the possibility that everything might just be my imagination.

msg_jp: この世界に秘密があるなんて、突拍子もないことに思えた。
msg_en: The secret of this world... the more I thought, the crazier it started to sound.

msg_jp: だって、手がかりはすべて形がない。
msg_en: Because all the clues I'd gathered so far were shapeless.

msg_jp: 僕が探してるのは、真の世界の姿で…
msg_en: What I look for is the shape of the true world...

msg_jp: それは古い哲学者が唱えたことだったが、今ではそんな世界があるとは誰も信じていない。
msg_en: Thus an ancient philosopher once proclaimed, but no one today actually believed such a thing really exists.

msg_jp: 自分がそんな空想家だったとは意外だな…とか。
msg_en: It was a shock to realize I was building similar castles in the clouds...

msg_jp: もうこのままでいいんじゃないか、とか…。
msg_en: Wouldn't it be just fine even if things kept going like they were...

msg_jp: そのたび、僕は邪念を振り払うために頬を自分で叩いた。
msg_en: Every time such distracting thoughts gripped me, I slapped myself on the cheek to banish them.

msg_jp: 僕は強く生きるって誓ったじゃないか。
msg_en: Don't forget how you swore to become strong, I told myself.

msg_jp: あれ？　それはいつだったっけ？
msg_en: Huh? When was that?

msg_jp: 誰に対してだったっけ？
msg_en: And who did I swear that to?

msg_jp: これだ…この感覚だ。
msg_en: This was it... This was the feeling.

msg_jp: 違う世界はある、と思い直す。
msg_en: It confirmed to me anew that this other world really existed.

msg_jp: その世界では僕は誓ったんだ。
msg_en: In that world, I had sworn.

msg_jp: 『これからは強く生きる』、と。
msg_en: To ❛become stronger.❜

msg_jp: 朝のＨＲで、鈴は転校生のように改めてクラスに迎えられた。
msg_en: During morning homeroom, Rin was introduced to the class again as if she were a transfer student.

msg_jp: 担任は続いて席替えの指示を出した。
msg_en: After that, the teacher told the class about our seating order.

msg_jp: 鈴の席は一番前だ。
msg_en: Her desk was to be in the first row.

msg_jp: 僕はその隣。教卓のすぐ正面だから、授業にとても身が入りそうだ。
msg_en: My new location was right in front of the teacher's desk, and I thought I would get to concentrate on lessons better than ever before there.

msg_jp: ＨＲの後、すぐ真人のもとへ勝手に席を移ってしまったことに謝りにいく。
msg_en: After homeroom, I went to Masato to apologize for not letting him know of the rearrangement beforehand.

msg_jp: もちろん鈴も一緒に連れて。
msg_en: Rin was with me, of course.

msg_jp: 僕は真人の姿を一目見て異変に気づいた。
msg_en: I noticed at first sight that something was wrong with him.

msg_jp: 二日ぶりに会った真人は、ひどく疲れた様子で自分の席でうなだれていた。
msg_en: Masato, whom I hadn't seen for the past two days, lay slumped on his desk, looking completely exhausted.

msg_jp: `鈴@「どうしたんだ、こいつ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What's going on with him?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「体の調子でも悪いの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Are you feeling ill or something?❞

msg_jp: そう訊くと、真人は少しも顔を上げずに答えた。
msg_en: As I asked, he answered without lifting his head even a bit.

msg_jp: `真人@「…またてめぇかよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Not you again.❞

msg_jp: 声には敵意がこもっていた。
msg_en: His voice contained hostility.

msg_jp: `真人@「もううんざりなんだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I'm freaking sick and tired of you...❞

msg_jp: まるで、何かに取り憑かれたような…そんな憔悴ぶりだ。
msg_en: He looked totally wiped out... as though he had been possessed by something.

msg_jp: `理樹@「寝てないの…？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Haven't you had any sleep...?❞

msg_jp: 言葉の内容まで届いていないのか、話しかけるたび、うんざりだと繰り返す。
msg_en: He didn't seem to grasp my words; each time I said something to him, he just repeated that he was sick of me.

msg_jp: `理樹@「具合悪そうだよ、保健室行こうよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You look horrible. Let's get you to the nurse's office...❞

msg_jp: いたわるようにそっと肩に手を置く。
msg_en: I softly put my hand on his shoulder.

msg_jp: ばちん！
msg_en: *Slap*.

msg_jp: `鈴@「うわっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Uwa!❞

msg_jp: 手首ごと飛んでいったかと思うほどの衝撃と痛みが走った。
msg_en: The impact that ran through my arm was strong enough to make me feel like my hand had been torn apart from the wrist.

msg_jp: 僕の手は振り払われていた。それに気づいたのは、手がじんじんと痛みだしてからだ。
msg_en: Only when my hand started aching did I realize he had thrown my hand off of him.

msg_jp: `鈴@「真人が暴力ふるった…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Masato just got violent...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「怪我したくなかったら近づくんじゃねぇぞ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If you don't wanna get hurt, stay away from me...❞

msg_jp: 金曜日の別れ際の言葉を思い出す。
msg_en: I recalled his parting words from last Friday.

msg_jp: 今のがそれだったのだろうか？
msg_en: Was this what he had been warning me about?

msg_jp: それが最強を目指すということ？
msg_en: Was this how he aimed to become the strongest?

msg_jp: まったくかけ離れてる気がした。
msg_en: I couldn't help but feel it was all wrong.

msg_jp: `鈴@「こいつ、やっぱり鬼こわい…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝He's still scary as hell...❞

msg_jp: とにかくこれ以上関わっても鈴を恐がらせるだけだ。
msg_en: Trying to keep Rin near him would just make her even more scared.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人、勝手に席替わってごめん…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato, I'm sorry I didn't tell you about changing my seat...❞

msg_jp: それだけを一方的に伝えると、鈴の肩を押して、その場を去った。
msg_en: Without even waiting for his reply, Rin and I left.

msg_jp: `理樹@「一時間目は現国だよ、準備できてる？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝First class is Japanese. Are you ready?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うん、大丈夫だ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Yeah, I'm good.❞

msg_jp: 思いのほか元気でいてくれてほっとする。
msg_en: I was relieved to see her more energetic than I had dared hope for.

msg_jp: 鈴の隣で授業を受けること、それは悪くないものだと思った。
msg_en: I found it didn't feel bad taking a class beside her.

msg_jp: ただ、この教室には幼なじみが僕らを含めて４人もいるのに、今は心が通っていないこと…それだけが辛かった。
msg_en: Still, there was just one thing weighing heavily on me: even though the two other childhood friends were also in this room, I wasn't getting along with them at all.

msg_jp: 何事もなく昼休みを迎えることができた。
msg_en: Lunch break had started without complications.

msg_jp: 鈴もせっせとノートを取り、授業に集中していた。
msg_en: Rin had stayed focused during the morning classes, and took down notes with ardor.

msg_jp: 隣で見ていて、やっぱりそれが正しい姿だと実感できた。
msg_en: By watching from her side, I was able to tell that she was behaving like a student should.

msg_jp: 混雑を避けるため、２０分ぐらい待ってから学食にいくことにした。
msg_en: In order to avoid the rush crowd, I waited for about 20 minutes with Rin before going to the cafeteria.

msg_jp: その間に事件は起きていた。
msg_en: In the meantime, an incident had taken place there.

msg_jp: 学食は騒然としていた。
msg_en: The entire cafeteria was in a tumult.

msg_jp: 中心に人の輪ができていた。
msg_en: In the center there was a circle of onlookers.

msg_jp: `鈴@「なんかヤなかんじだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I've got a nasty feeling.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うん…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「何があったか訊いてくるよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll go see what's going on over there.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「あたしもいく」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I'm coming too.❞

msg_jp: 人混みを掻き分け、輪の中心へ。
msg_en: I pushed people out of our way to get to the center of the crowd.

msg_jp: 男子生徒が膝の上に寝かされていた。
msg_en: A male student lay there with his head on the lap of another.

msg_jp: 鼻血が出ているのだろう、血の滲んだ手ぬぐいで鼻から下が覆われていた。
msg_en: His nose must have been bleeding, as his face was half covered with a bloody handkerchief.

msg_jp: `理樹@「どうしたの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝What happened?❞

msg_jp: 近くにいた同級生に訊いてみる。
msg_en: I asked a nearby classmate.

msg_jp: `男子生徒@「井ノ原だよ…あいつにやられたらしい…」
msg_en: `Male Student@❝Inohara... I hear he did this...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「やられたって、喧嘩？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Did what? Was it a fight?❞

msg_jp: `男子生徒@「楠本だぜ、あいつが喧嘩なんてするかよ」
msg_en: `Male Student@❝Look, it's Kusumoto. You know he wouldn't fight anyone.❞

msg_jp: 楠本…ひょろっとした柔なシルエットが思い浮かぶ。
msg_en: Kusumoto... I immediately recalled the boy's lanky profile.

msg_jp: 今まさに目の前に倒れているのが、その細い体だ。
msg_en: And the one lying right before me was none other than the owner of the figure.

msg_jp: `理樹@「じゃ、一方的に？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝So it was all one-sided?❞

msg_jp: 無言のまま頷く。
msg_en: The classmate nodded affirmatively.

msg_jp: `理樹@「まさか…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No way...❞

msg_jp: にわかには信じられなかったが、今朝見た真人の変わりようを考えると、ありえそうな事態にも思えてくる。
msg_en: It was hard for me to believe it, yet considering the change I'd witnessed in Masato this morning, I couldn't confidently dismiss the claim as ludicrous.

msg_jp: ぎゅっと手が握られる。
msg_en: Rin's grip on my hand tightened.

msg_jp: `鈴@「あいつ悪い奴になったのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Has he turned into a bad guy?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人はいい奴だよ。きっと何か事情があるはずだ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝He's a good guy. I'm certain he has a good explanation for this...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「昼ご飯食べたら探して話を聞いてみよう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Let's find him and ask about it once we've had lunch.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「なにぃ…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴は僕の後ろに隠れてればいいから」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You can just hide behind me.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹、勝てるのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Riki, can you defeat him?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや、戦うわけじゃないから」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No, I'm not going to fight him.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いや、戦うことになると思うぞ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝No, I think you're going to end up having to fight him.❞

msg_jp: 鈴の口からそんな突拍子もない台詞が聞けるとは思わなかった。
msg_en: I never expected such an erratic prediction to come out of her mouth.

msg_jp: 真人を探して回る。
msg_en: We looked around for Masato.

msg_jp: 真人はあちこちで騒ぎを起こしているらしい。
msg_en: While searching, we heard he was causing a ruckus in one place after another.

msg_jp: 行く先々で見る光景は、学食と同じものだった。
msg_en: Everywhere we went, we were met by the scene from the cafeteria.

msg_jp: 今回は直接被害者から話が聞けた。
msg_en: I managed to ask one of the victims in person.

msg_jp: その男子生徒は鳩尾を殴られ、今ようやく立ち上がれるようになったところだ。
msg_en: He'd gotten hit in the solar plexus and had finally recovered enough to stand up.

msg_jp: `理樹@「いきなり襲いかかられたの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Did he hit you out of the blue?❞

msg_jp: `男子@「いや、うずくまって様子がおかしかったから、話しかけてみたんだよ」
msg_en: `Boy@❝No, I saw him hunched over and went to ask him if he was okay.❞

msg_jp: `男子@「そうしたら、『強いほうがオレだ』ってよくわからないことを言って、殴りかかってきたんだ」
msg_en: `Boy@❝Then he suddenly yelled 'I'm stronger than you' and lashed at me. It made no sense.❞

msg_jp: …強いほうがオレ？　確かに意味がわからない。
msg_en: ...'I'm stronger than you'? Like he said, it didn't make any sense.

msg_jp: `鈴@「みろ、理樹」
msg_en: `Rin@❝See, Riki?❞

msg_jp: 鈴が真剣な眼差しを僕にくれる。
msg_en: Rin shot me a serious look.

msg_jp: `鈴@「誰かが倒さなくちゃいけないんだ、あいつを」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Someone has to defeat him.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「そんな…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Get outta here...❞

msg_jp: チャイムが鳴る。
msg_en: A bell rang.

msg_jp: 昼休み中には真人を探し出せなかった。
msg_en: In the end, we weren't able to find Masato during lunch.

msg_jp: 教室に戻ってきても、真人の姿はない。
msg_en: He wasn't in the classroom either, as we found out upon our return.

msg_jp: 午後からの授業はさぼるつもりなのだろうか。
msg_en: He was probably going to cut the rest of today's classes.

msg_jp: 教師がきても、真人の席は空いたままだった。
msg_en: Even when the teacher arrived, he hadn't shown up.

msg_jp: 僕が隣の席からいなくなったから、すねているのかな…。
msg_en: Could he be mad about me changing desks...?

msg_jp: いや、とすぐ打ち消す。
msg_en: No, I immediately told myself, that wasn't it.

msg_jp: もしそれですねているとしても、他人に八つ当たりなんてする奴じゃない…。
msg_en: Even if he were, he wouldn't take his anger out on other people...

msg_jp: やっぱり何かがあったんだ。
msg_en: Something else was amiss.

msg_jp: 授業が始まる前に、担任が入ってくる。
msg_en: Before the class commenced, our homeroom teacher came in.

msg_jp: `担任@「あー、井ノ原は戻ってきていないな」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝So Inohara isn't here, either.❞

msg_jp: その名前が挙がり、僕はどきっとする。
msg_en: My head jolted up in surprise upon the mention of Masato's name.

msg_jp: `担任@「今、あいつが校舎を徘徊して、暴れ回っているという話が入ってきた」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I've been informed that he's rampaging around in the school right now.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「何があったかよく知らないが、こちらも捕まえ次第事情を聞いてみるが」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I have no idea what's going on with him, but I'm going to find him and listen to what he has to say.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「とにかくおまえたちは井ノ原を見つけたら、決して近づこうとせず、先生に知らせるように」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Even if any of you find him, just keep your distance and come tell me.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「失礼しました。では」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝That's all. Sorry for the interruption.❞

msg_jp: 教員に一礼して、去っていく。
msg_en: With a bow, he left the classroom.

msg_jp: そうしてすべてのクラスを回っているのだろう。
msg_en: He must be in the middle of warning each class about Masato.

msg_jp: `鈴@「おおごとになってきたな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝This has become a big deal.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うん…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

msg_jp: 僕は金曜日の真人の言葉を思い出す。
msg_en: I reminded myself of what Masato had said on Friday.

msg_jp: `真人@「…オレはたぶんこれから最強を証明し始めるだろう」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Guess it's soon time for me to start proving that I'm the strongest.❞

msg_jp: …その本人の予言通りになり始めている。
msg_en: ...It was starting to sound more and more like a prophecy.

msg_jp: なら、真人が能動的に暴力を振るって回っているということになる。
msg_en: It seemed to be a fact that Masato was indiscriminately attacking people.

msg_jp: いや、今朝の姿を思い出せ。
msg_en: But what about the way he looked this morning?

msg_jp: あれが、最強を証明しようという男の顔だろうか？
msg_en: Who would wear that kind of face when attempting to prove their strength?

msg_jp: 憔悴しきって、まるで正気じゃないようになってたじゃないか。
msg_en: Rather, he just looked worn out to a point where he had snapped.

msg_jp: これはどういうことだろう…。
msg_en: What did that mean...

msg_jp: 僕には金曜の言葉が、これから自分に降りかかる不幸を予言していたように思える。
msg_en: His statement from last Friday felt like a prophecy of impending misfortune.

msg_jp: `鈴@「やはり、理樹、戦うしかないんじゃないのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Like I said, Riki, aren't you gonna have to fight him?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「まさか…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No way...❞

msg_jp: 放課後になると、僕と鈴はふたりで職員室を訪れていた。
msg_en: After school, Rin and I visited the faculty office.

msg_jp: 真人の情報を訊くためだ。
msg_en: The purpose was to collect information on Masato.

msg_jp: 自席で頭を抱えている担任を捕まえた。
msg_en: We caught our homeroom teacher languishing over something at his desk.

msg_jp: `担任@「ああ、おまえらか、どうした？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Oh, what's up with you two?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いや、おまえがどうした」
msg_en: `Rin@❝No, what's up with YOU?❞

msg_jp: `担任@「こっちは井ノ原の件で頭がいっぱいだよ…」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I'm racking my brain over Inohara...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「その真人の話を聞きたいんですが…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Actually, we're here to ask you about him...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「ふぅ…」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Phew...❞

msg_jp: 担任は重苦しいため息をついた後、話をしてくれた。
msg_en: With a heavy sigh, he started explaining.

msg_jp: わかっているだけで現在、被害者は５名。すべて男子。
msg_en: As of now, there had been five victims in total, all of them male students.

msg_jp: 挑発もしていない。ただ声をかけただけで一方的に殴られている。
msg_en: None of them had aggravated him: they only spoke to him and got a blow in return.

msg_jp: 全員一発でのされており、それが逆に幸いし、軽傷で済んでいるという。
msg_en: Fortunately, since he knocked them all down with just one punch, none of them got injured too seriously.

msg_jp: 確かに、真人に殴られ続けたら病院送りだろう。
msg_en: If he had kept pounding on them, they would have ended up in the hospital for sure.

msg_jp: 最後に発見されたのは保健室前。そこからの足取りは途絶えているらしい。
msg_en: The fifth victim was found in front of the nurse's office, and that was where Masato's trail disappeared.

msg_jp: `担任@「何があったんだ一体。教えてくれないか？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝What in the world is going on with him? Will you tell me?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いや、おまえがおしえろ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝No, YOU tell us.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「わからないから頭を抱えてるんじゃないか。おまえら知ってるんじゃないのか？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I don't know anything, that's why I'm at such a loss. You must know something, don't you?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕らもよくわからなくて…。ただ、最強を目指してるような話は以前に聞いたんですが…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We don't have a clear idea either... But we did hear him talking about making himself the strongest...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「最強？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Strongest?❞

msg_jp: 教師はすっとんきょうな声をあげた。
msg_en: He let out a broken yelp in surprise.

msg_jp: `担任@「あいつより強い奴なんて宮沢ぐらいなもんだろ？　明らかに相手のほうが弱いじゃないか。どうしてこんな通り魔的なことをする必要がある？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I'm quite sure Miyazawa is the only one stronger than him at this school. Why would he attack those way weaker than himself?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「そこを考えるのがおまえだろ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝That's what you're supposed to figure out.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「いや、助けてくれよ、さっぱりわからない、お手上げだ」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Help me out here, please. I don't know what to do. I'm so stuck.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「さぁ…そこが僕らもわからないところで…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Well... We're trying to puzzle it out as well...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「まさか全校生徒をのして回ろうって気じゃないだろうなあ…」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Could it be that he's going to beat up all the students here...❞

msg_jp: 本当にまさかの話だ。
msg_en: That was the last thing that anyone wanted to see happen.

msg_jp: `担任@「とにかく捕まえるしかない。これから先生たちで探すところだ」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Anyway, we have to catch him. I'm going to go look for him with some other teachers now.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「その…差し出がましいですが…先生たちの手に負えるんですか？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Um... I don't want you to take this the wrong way, but... do you really think you teachers alone will be able to take care of him?❞

msg_jp: `担任@「ふたり一組で行動するつもりだ」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝We're going to make teams of two.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「のされて終わりだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝He'll knock you down before you know what's happening.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「せめて三人以上にしたほうが…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I think you should have at least three per team...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「若い男性教員は４人しかいないんだよっ」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝We only have four young male teachers here!❞

msg_jp: 苦々しく吐きすてた。
msg_en: He spit out in anguish.

msg_jp: `女性教員@「すみません、お話の途中。これでよろしいでしょうか？」
msg_en: `Female Teacher@❝I'm sorry for interrupting, but could I have a word with you?❞

msg_jp: 女性教員が間に入ってきて、一枚のわら半紙を担任に見せる。
msg_en: A female teacher broke between us to pass him a handout.

msg_jp: 覗き見ると、それは、真人の手配書だった。
msg_en: Rin and I took a peep at the paper and learned it was a search instruction for Masato.

msg_jp: `鈴@「戦うしかないな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝You've got no choice but to fight him.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「わかってるよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I know.❞

msg_jp: すべて再現されてしまった。
msg_en: It was all a reproduction.

msg_jp: 僕の知らない、恭介と鈴と真人、その三人の過去だ。
msg_en: Of a past event shared by only Kyousuke, Rin and Masato.

msg_jp: 誰によって？
msg_en: But who had recreated it?

msg_jp: 真人はこうなることを予言していた。
msg_en: Masato had foretold that this would happen.

msg_jp: じゃあ真人が？
msg_en: Then was it him?

msg_jp: いや、真人が自分より弱い他人を傷つけるなんて望むはずない。
msg_en: No, he couldn't wish to hurt those weaker than himself.

msg_jp: じゃあ、誰がこの状況を望んだ？
msg_en: Then who was it that had wished for this?

msg_jp: そんなの誰でもない…
msg_en: The answer was obvious...

msg_jp: 最初のふたりから、鈴の記憶を元に、恭介の歩んできた跡を辿ろうとした…
msg_en: It was the one attempting to retrace Kyousuke's footsteps based on Rin's memories...

msg_jp: ――僕自身じゃないか。
msg_en: ――It was none other than myself.

msg_jp: 僕のせいで、真人が悪者になってしまった…。
msg_en: All because of me, Masato has turned into a villain...

msg_jp: `鈴@「…どうした？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...What's wrong?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Nothing...❞

msg_jp: もしそうならそうで、今は真人を止めることしかできないんだ。
msg_en: If this was actually a repetition of their past, the only option left for me was to stop him with my own devices.

msg_jp: なら、やるしかない。
msg_en: I had to do it.

msg_jp: 時間が経てば、被害者が増えるだけだ。
msg_en: There was no time to waste; I couldn't let there be any more victims.

msg_jp: でも、どうやって真人に勝つ？
msg_en: But how could I win against him?

msg_jp: この脆弱な体で。
msg_en: With this fragile body of mine.

msg_jp: 考えろ、考えろ。
msg_en: Think, just think.

msg_jp: どうする？
msg_en: What do I do?

msg_jp: 力業で$d頭を使って$d数で勝負
msg_en: Use force$dUse my brain$dGo with numbers

msg_jp: `理樹@「力業で玉砕覚悟でいこう…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll go for broke...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹ひとりでか？　ほんとに玉砕するぞ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝By yourself? You're seriously gonna die.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「もうちょっと考えたほうがいいんじゃないか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I think you should think it over.❞

msg_jp: 鈴にそこまで言われると、確かにそんな気もしてきた…。
msg_en: Her words had such a clear ring of truth that I was persuaded to think again...

msg_jp: 頭を使って$d数で勝負
msg_en: Use my brain$dGo with numbers

msg_jp: `理樹@「運動部を回って有志を募ろう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Let's go ask people from the sports clubs for help.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「すごいな。みんなで倒すんだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Getting allies to fight with? That sounds awesome.❞

msg_jp: 三つの部活を回った時点で、僕は挫けた。
msg_en: By the time I had visited three clubs, I gave up.

msg_jp: 誰ひとり集まらなかったからだ。
msg_en: No one would give me a hand.

msg_jp: もし謙吾が居てくれたら、みんなの反応も違ったと思う。情けない話だけど。
msg_en: If Kengo had asked them, the reception definitely would've been different. I felt so miserable.

msg_jp: 自分の人望のなさに泣けてくる。
msg_en: It was depressing to learn how much less respect I commanded.

msg_jp: `鈴@「どうした？　泣きそうな顔だな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? You look like you're about to cry.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「次のクラブはどこにするんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What club will we go to next?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや、考え直すよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No, I give up...❞

msg_jp: 残るは頭で考えるやり方だ。
msg_en: The only way left was using my brain.

msg_jp: `理樹@「運動部を回って有志を募ろう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Let's go ask people from sports clubs for help.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「すごいな。みんなで倒すんだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Getting allies to fight with? That sounds awesome.❞

msg_jp: 三つの部活を回った時点で、僕は挫けた。
msg_en: By the time I had visited three clubs, I gave up.

msg_jp: 誰ひとり集まらなかったからだ。
msg_en: No one would give me a hand.

msg_jp: もし謙吾が居てくれたら、みんなの反応も違ったと思う。情けない話だけど。
msg_en: If Kengo had asked them, the reception definitely would've been different. I felt so miserable.

msg_jp: 自分の人望のなさに泣けてくる。
msg_en: It was depressing to learn how much less respect I commanded.

msg_jp: `鈴@「どうした？　泣きそうな顔だな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What's wrong with you? You look like you're about to cry.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「次のクラブはどこにするんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What club will we go to next?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや、考え直すよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No, I give up...❞

msg_jp: 力業で$d頭を使って
msg_en: Use force$dUse my brain

msg_jp: `理樹@「力業で玉砕覚悟でいこう…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll go for broke...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹ひとりでか？　ほんとに玉砕するぞ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝By yourself? You're seriously gonna die.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「もうちょっと考えたほうがいいんじゃないか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I think you should think it over.❞

msg_jp: 鈴にそこまで言われると、確かにそんな気もしてきた…。
msg_en: Her words had such a clear ring of truth that I was persuaded to think again...

msg_jp: 残るは頭で考えるやり方だ。
msg_en: The only way left was using my brain.

msg_jp: 強さは力だけじゃない。賢さも強さだ。頭を使って、狡猾にやってやる。
msg_en: Being strong doesn't just mean having great strength; I can fight cleverly using my wits.

msg_jp: `理樹@「校内にトラップを仕掛ける」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll set up a trap for him.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「それも真人以外は絶対に引っかからない馬鹿なトラップをだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝A silly trap that only he would ever fall for.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「おぉー」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Ooh.❞

msg_jp: 鈴が興奮したように息を漏らした。
msg_en: She exclaimed in admiration, suddenly excited.

msg_jp: `理樹@「なに？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝What?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「恭介といっしょだ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Kyousuke did that too.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「恭介もトラップを作って、真人を罠にはめたの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Did he use a trap to get Masato, also?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うん」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Yep.❞

msg_jp: …やった。自力で正解を導き出せた。
msg_en: ...I did it. I had managed to draw out the right answer on my own.

msg_jp: `鈴@「トラップ作りはあたしも手伝ったんだ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I helped him make them.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「すごく楽しかった！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝It was really fun!❞

msg_jp: なるほど、それを楽しかったと言っていたのか。
msg_en: Now I get it, that's what she had meant when she said it was fun before.

msg_jp: `理樹@「よし、じゃ、作ろうか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝All right, then. Let's get to work.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うんっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Sure!❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは、準備に取りかかった。
msg_en: We started to prepare.

msg_jp: …さて、トラップを作るのはいいとして、どうしたものだろうか。
msg_en: ...Now that we've decided to lay traps, I wonder what kind we should make?

msg_jp: 真人を捕まえるなら、何か足止めする方法を考えないといけない。
msg_en: To capture him, we need something that will hold him in place.

msg_jp: `理樹@「うーん」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Hmm.❞

msg_jp: しばらく考える。
msg_en: I pondered for a while.

msg_jp: 次第にぼやけた全体像が輪郭を帯びてきた。
msg_en: Gradually the vague outline in my mind was starting to become clear.

msg_jp: `鈴@「どうかしたのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What is it?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「まあいいか。まずは材料集めをしようか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Never mind. Let's go get the things we need.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うんっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Sure!❞

msg_jp: 僕は、部活棟を巡って色々と交渉していた。
msg_en: I visited each club room to negotiate their cooperation.

msg_jp: 真人を止める、と話せば皆がそれなら、と協力してくれた。
msg_en: They all consented to my requests when I divulged my plot to stop Masato.

msg_jp: さすがにあの真人を止めるのは至難の業だと思ってるのだろう。
msg_en: Yet they seemed to share the thought that it would be extremely hard for me to succeed.

msg_jp: `理樹@「お待たせ、鈴」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'm back, Rin.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「どこ行ってたんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Where did you go?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「科学部の部室」
msg_en: `Riki@❝The science club room.❞

msg_jp: 懸念がひとつ減った。
msg_en: Visiting them erased one of my concerns.

msg_jp: 科学部の噂は聞いていた。
msg_en: I had heard the rumor about them.

msg_jp: 部活で様々な品を実験していたという有名な話。
msg_en: It was well known in the school that they made all kinds of strange experiments.

msg_jp: とはいえ、僕らと同じくらい騒ぎも起こしてたからなんだけど。
msg_en: That is to say, they often caused a ruckus just like us.

msg_jp: `理樹@「これでなんとかなるかな…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I wonder if this strategy will work...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「こんなもんどうするんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What are you going to do with this?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人に殴ってもらうんだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Make Masato punch it.❞

msg_jp: 鈴が抱えているのは、ボクシング部から借りた古い練習用ミット。
msg_en: What she was holding was an old punching mitt borrowed from the boxing club.

msg_jp: `理樹@「じゃ次だね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝On to the next step.❞

msg_jp: 用務員室から材料と工具を借りて、一通り揃った。
msg_en: I borrowed other items and tools from the school janitor.

msg_jp: `理樹@「よし、作ろうか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Okay, time to make it.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「なにをしたらいいっ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What do I do?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「そうだねぇ…。なら、これ支えてくれる？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Let's see... Can you support this?❞

msg_jp: 校庭から持ってきた鉄製の演説台に、まず木箱を載せ、縄で十字に縛り、固定する。
msg_en: I set a wooden box on the metal podium I had brought from the sports grounds, and fixed it into place with rope.

msg_jp: さらにそれに貰ってきたベニヤをかぶせる。
msg_en: I then covered it up with a plywood sheet.

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴、これ、釘で止めてくれない？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin, can you nail this up?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「気をつけてね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Careful.❞

msg_jp: 鈴は楽しそうに金槌で釘を叩いている。
msg_en: She was hammering with passion.

msg_jp: 金属の板に借りてきたパンチングミットを差しこみ固定する。
msg_en: I inserted the punching mitt between metal boards and tied them up firmly.

msg_jp: これなら殴っても壊れない。
msg_en: With this, it wouldn't get broken easily.

msg_jp: 僕はアスファルトにレールをおいていく。
msg_en: And then I set its rails down on the asphalt ground.

msg_jp: `理樹@「この糸を引っ張ってくれる？　ぴんと力を入れてね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Will you pull these strings? As strongly as you can.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うん」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

msg_jp: 鈴が持つ糸に沿って、レールを水平に固定していく。
msg_en: I aligned the rails on the ground horizontally to the strings.

msg_jp: `鈴@「でも、どうするんだ？　こんなの」
msg_en: `Rin@❝But what's this thing good for?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「このトラップはまっすぐ進まないといけないんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝This trap only works when it travels in a straight line.❞

msg_jp: 古い台車のキャスターに油を差し、動かしてみると、
msg_en: I lubricated the wheels of the old push cart and tried to move it...

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわっ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

msg_jp: …前に進まずひっくり返ってしまった。
msg_en: ...However, it fell down instead of moving forward.

msg_jp: `鈴@「だいじょうぶかっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝You all right!?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「大丈夫だよ。…もう少し考えるか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'm fine... Guess I need to make some changes.❞

msg_jp: ひっくり返らないように借りてきたブロックを重りとしてくくりつける。
msg_en: I roped a few blocks around it as weight.

msg_jp: 何度か試してみたら、上手く動いてくれた。
msg_en: I then tested it a couple times with 100% success.

msg_jp: あとは真人の馬鹿力に期待しよう。
msg_en: The only thing I could do now was place my hopes on Masato's brute strength.

msg_jp: `理樹@「ふぅ…完成、と」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Phew... It's all finished.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴もありがとう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin, thanks for your help.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「楽しかった！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝It was fun!❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「はは…それはなによりで」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Haha... Glad to hear that.❞

msg_jp: 見た目は手作りなので稚拙極まりないが、真人に対してはこれで十分なはずだ。
msg_en: The thing looked every bit as homemade as it was, but I was certain it would work well enough for Masato.

msg_jp: 台の上に棒が立っており、その先にはボクシングの練習に使うミット。
msg_en: In front of the podium stood a wooden pole, and on it there was a worn boxing mitt.

msg_jp: ゲームセンターによく置いてあるパンチングマシーンを模してある。
msg_en: I had imitated one of those punching machines you could find in an arcade.

msg_jp: それが理事長の銅像の後ろに設置してある。
msg_en: We placed it behind the bronze statue of the superintendent.

msg_jp: 校内の至るところに『最強の方はこちらへ→』と書かれた張り紙をして、ここまで誘導する。
msg_en: Next, we would post signboards saying ❛The strongest one, go this way❜ throughout the school to lead Masato there.

msg_jp: その先でこのミットを見れば、真人は殴らずにはいられまい。
msg_en: And once he recognized the mitt, he should not be able to resist the urge to punch it.

msg_jp: 台の上に乗ってミットを殴ると、その力の反動でキャスター付きの台が動き、バックする。
msg_en: When he got atop the cart and gave the mitt a blow, the cart would move backward.

msg_jp: 真人の渾身の一発で殴れば、その体は後ろに勢いよく吹っ飛ぶことになるだろう。
msg_en: If he punched with all his might, he would slide back really fast.

msg_jp: そこには理事長の銅像。
msg_en: And what awaited to catch him was the statue of the superintendent.

msg_jp: その背中には液体を入れた風船が吊されている。
msg_en: On its back hung a balloon with a certain type of liquid inside it.

msg_jp: 中身は科学部から仕入れた強力な瞬間接着剤だ。
msg_en: The liquid was a superglue mixed by the science club.

msg_jp: 真人がぶつかると、それが破裂して、一瞬にして銅像とくっついてしまう。
msg_en: Once Masato crashed into the balloon, it would burst and he'd be glued to the statue in the blink of an eye.

msg_jp: まさしく磔状態となる、そういうトラップだ。
msg_en: He would literally end up crucified upon the statue; that's how the trap functioned.

msg_jp: 手足は動くが、そこまで封じては勝った気にならないから、このぐらいがちょうどいいように思えた。
msg_en: He would still be able to move his arms and legs, but that was good enough. If I rendered him completely immobile, I wouldn't feel a sense of victory.

msg_jp: それで勝てなければ真人を引き入れる資格はないと考えよう。
msg_en: And I'd decided to give up on getting him on the team if I lost to him with this trap.

msg_jp: 僕たちは担任にそのトラップのことを話した。
msg_en: I explained our strategy to our homeroom teacher.

msg_jp: `担任@「なるほど…あの井ノ原ならそのぐらいしないと捕まらないか…」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝You do make sense... I agree that one has to go at least that far to catch Inohara...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「銅像に被害はおよばないのか？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝But won't your trap damage the statue?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「この中和剤を使えばきれいにはがせます」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Not at all, as long as you use this neutralizer.❞

msg_jp: 透明の液体で満たされたペットボトルを見せる。これも同じく科学部から調達したものだ。
msg_en: I showed him a plastic bottle filled with pellucid liquid, also courtesy of the science club.

msg_jp: `担任@「ふむ…」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I see...❞

msg_jp: `担任@「わかった。おまえらに任せよう」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝Okay, I'll leave this whole thing in the hands of you two.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「だが、せめて校内放送で、井ノ原以外は銅像に近づかないよう注意を促すぞ？」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝But you have to at least let me announce to the entire school that no one but Inohara is allowed near the statue, all right?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「ばかな放送だな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What a retarded announcement.❞

msg_jp: `担任@「では、健闘を祈る」
msg_en: `Homeroom Teacher@❝I wish you the best of luck.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「はい」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Thank you.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「なんだかおおごとになっちゃったな…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Geez, this has turned into such a big deal...❞
`Rin@❝Yeah...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「でもなんだかこれはこれで楽しいな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝But somehow I'm having a lot of fun.❞

msg_jp: そう言われると、俄然やる気が湧いてくる。不思議なものだ。
msg_en: That confession of hers motivated me greatly. It was a feeling that made me marvel.

msg_jp: これが…当時の恭介を突き動かしていた力なのだろうか。
msg_en: This... could be the very power that had pushed Kyousuke on back then.

msg_jp: ただ、ひたすらに楽しいことを考えて行動に移す。
msg_en: Single-mindedly thinking only of fun stuff and translating it into action.

msg_jp: なんだか、そんな生き方が人間のあるべき姿な気がしてきた。
msg_en: Somehow that was starting to feel like the way a human being should live.

msg_jp: だって、それこそが僕のあの日からの、生き甲斐だったんだから。
msg_en: After all, that had been our raison d'etre ever since our childhood days.

msg_jp: その後、僕と鈴は学校の敷地内に張り紙をして回った。
msg_en: After the visit to the faculty office, Rin and I posted signs all over the school.

msg_jp: ぴんぽんぱんぽーん…と校内放送が始まる。
msg_en: *Pin-pon-pan-pon*... the loudspeakers crackled into life.

msg_jp: `放送@『２年Ｅ組井ノ原真人君以外は校舎前の銅像に近づかないようにしてください。繰り返します…』
msg_en: `Broadcaster@[Attention, all students and staff except for Masato Inohara-kun from class 2-E, please keep clear of the bronze statue in front of the school building. I repeat...]

msg_jp: `鈴@「ばかな放送がはじまった…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝The retarded announcement has begun...❞

msg_jp: 鈴が校舎を見上げて呟く。
msg_en: Rin muttered, looking up at the school building.

msg_jp: `理樹@「今は全校生徒が危険にさらされてるんだ。急ごう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝The entire school is in danger right now. We'd better hurry up.❞

msg_jp: 張り紙の束を鈴にも持たせた。
msg_en: I handed her a stack of signs as well.

msg_jp: 僕たちは茂みの中に隠れて、ひたすら真人がトラップにかかるのを待った。
msg_en: We hid ourselves in a bush, waiting for Masato to fall for our trap.

msg_jp: なぜか僕の胸も、どきどき高鳴る。
msg_en: For whatever reason, my heart was pounding.

msg_jp: 鈴もやたらそわそわしている。
msg_en: Rin seemed to be on pins and needles, too.

msg_jp: 今、共有しているこの感覚を…楽しいと呼ぶんだろうな。
msg_en: The sensation we were sharing at this moment... I was sure this was the very definition of fun.

msg_jp: 無茶なことをやろうとしているし、被害者も出ている。
msg_en: I knew what we were about to do was foolhardy to the extreme, and there were already several victims.

msg_jp: そんな状況で、楽しさを感じるなんて節操がなさすぎる。
msg_en: They weren't any circumstances to be enjoying ourselves.

msg_jp: でも、楽しい。
msg_en: But it really was fun.

msg_jp: この気持ちだけは、どうにも抑えつけられない。
msg_en: I couldn't fight back that feeling.

msg_jp: `鈴@「…きたっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...Here he comes!❞

msg_jp: 鈴の声で我に返る。
msg_en: Rin's voice brought me back to reality.

msg_jp: 大きな人影が近づいてくる。あの体躯は真人以外に考えられない。
msg_en: I spotted a tall figure approaching. That huge frame could've been none other than Masato.

msg_jp: ふらふらとした足取りだ。まるでグロッキー状態のボクサーのようだ。
msg_en: Masato was walking listlessly, reminding me of a groggy boxer.

msg_jp: 銅像の後ろ、パンチングマシーンの前まで辿りつく。
msg_en: He arrived behind the statue, where our home-made punching machine was set up.

msg_jp: `真人@「はっ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hmph...❞

msg_jp: 真人は鼻で笑う。
msg_en: He snorted with laughter.

msg_jp: `真人@「これをぶん殴れば…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I smash this down...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「全員消えてくれるのかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Will they all be gone...?❞

msg_jp: …どういう意味だ？
msg_en: ...What does he mean?

msg_jp: `真人@「なら、やってやろうじゃないか…うおりゃああああああぁぁぁぁーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Then, I'll do it... Uooryaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!❞

msg_jp: いった！
msg_en: All right!

msg_jp: どごんっ!!
msg_en: *Do-gon*!!

msg_jp: しゃーーーーーっ!!
msg_en: *Shaaaa*!!

msg_jp: `真人@「うおおぉぉぉぉーーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uooooohhhhh!!❞

msg_jp: ずぅんっ！
msg_en: *Fwoosh*!

msg_jp: 地震でも起きたかのような衝動がここまで伝わってくる。
msg_en: An earthquake-like implosion reached even our hiding place.

msg_jp: `鈴@「かかった！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝We got him!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「やったぞ、理樹」
msg_en: `Rin@❝We did it, Riki.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うんっ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Yeah!❞

msg_jp: 立ち上がり、持っていたライトを点けて、銅像まで駆けつける。
msg_en: We stood up with our flashlights and ran up to the statue.
`Rin@❝Hands.❞

msg_jp: 鈴の手を取り、さらに近づく。
msg_en: I held her hand and got closer.

msg_jp: 銅像の裏側を照らし出すと、苦渋の表情でうなだれる真人の姿が浮かび上がった。
msg_en: As I directed the light behind the statue, I found Masato drooping there with an anguished look on his face.

msg_jp: `鈴@「みごとにはりついてるな…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝They're perfectly stuck to each other...❞

msg_jp: 途中で体を捻ったのだろう、背中じゃなく右半身が銅像にくっついていた。
msg_en: He must have twisted around before hitting the statue, as it was his right side that was stuck to it instead of his back.

msg_jp: 利き腕が動かない状態だ。
msg_en: His dominant arm was rendered useless.

msg_jp: `真人@「眩しい…ライトを消せ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Too bright... Turn off the light...❞

msg_jp: 月明かりだけで十分見える。僕はライトを消した。
msg_en: The moonlight was bright enough for us to see each other, so I did as he told me.

msg_jp: `真人@「また、てめぇかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Not you again, damn it...❞

msg_jp: 僕の顔を見て吐きすてた。
msg_en: He spat off as he recognized my face.

msg_jp: `真人@「なんだよこれ…取れねぇんだが…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What the hell is this thing... It won't come off...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「悪いけど、この中和剤がないと取れないよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Sorry, but you need this neutralizer to get it off.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…何が目的だ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...What do you want?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人の暴走を止めるためだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You've been acting crazy, so we came to stop you.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…暴走だと？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...I've been acting crazy?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「はは…てめぇらにはそう見えるのか、そういうふうになってんのか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Haha... is that how you guys see me? Is that how I now look?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「狂ってるのはこの世界だあああーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝IT'S THIS BLOODY WORLD THAT'S GONE INSANE!!!❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわぁ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Uwah.❞

msg_jp: 鈴が僕の手を引いたまま逃げようとするので、僕はすっころぶ。
msg_en: I tripped over as Rin tried to flee while still holding my hand.

msg_jp: `鈴@「やっぱりあいつ鬼こわい」
msg_en: `Rin@❝He never fails to freak the hell out of me.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「ちょっと様子を見よう…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Let's wait and see...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「…静かだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...It's gotten quiet.❞

msg_jp: そういえば、真人の雄叫びがやんでいた。
msg_en: Before I knew it, he had stopped bellowing.

msg_jp: `理樹@「疲れたんだろうね…もう一度話し合いにいこうか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝He must be tired... Let's go speak to him again.❞

msg_jp: 腰を上げる。
msg_en: I got to my feet.
`Rin@❝Hands.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うん」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Right.❞

msg_jp: 鈴の手を引いて、近づいていく。
msg_en: Holding Rin's hand, I approached him.

msg_jp: 異様に静かだ。眠ってしまったのだろうか。
msg_en: It was strangely quiet. Could he be asleep?

msg_jp: `鈴@「…いないんじゃないのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...I guess he's not there.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「まさか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝That can't be.❞

msg_jp: …そこには何もなかった。
msg_en: ...There was nothing there.

msg_jp: `理樹@「ちょっと待ってよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Hang on a second...❞

msg_jp: 僕はライトを点けて、銅像を照らし出す。
msg_en: I switched the light on and shone it on the statue.

msg_jp: が、その銅像すら見つからない。
msg_en: Or rather, on the place where the statue should've stood.

msg_jp: ライトを地面に向けると、土が掘り返されていた。
msg_en: I turned the light down on the ground and discovered it had been dug up.

msg_jp: `鈴@「穴があいてるな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Look, there's a hole down there.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「は、はは…まさか…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Ha, haha... No way...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「あいつならやりかねない」
msg_en: `Rin@❝That guy can do it.❞

msg_jp: それは、つまり…
msg_en: To put it another way...

msg_jp: 銅像ごと逃げた。
msg_en: He had escaped with the statue.

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわぁ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Oh my god...❞

msg_jp: とんでもないことになった…。
msg_en: This had turned into such a huge mess...

msg_jp: 遠くで悲鳴が上がる。
msg_en: We heard somebody scream far in the distance.

msg_jp: `鈴@「あっちだ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Over there.❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは駆けだした。
msg_en: We took off running.

msg_jp: ひとりの教師が地面にへたり込んでいた。
msg_en: We found a teacher lying on his back.

msg_jp: `理樹@「大丈夫ですか？　何があったんですか？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Are you all right? What happened?❞

msg_jp: `教師@「うわ…あ…」
msg_en: `Teacher@❝Uwa... aaah...❞

msg_jp: 教師は開きっぱなしの口で答えた。
msg_en: He answered with his mouth flapping open.

msg_jp: `教師@「銅像が…歩いていた…」
msg_en: `Teacher@❝The statue... it was walking...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「…やっぱり」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...I knew it.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「怪我はなかったですか？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Are you hurt?❞

msg_jp: `教師@「…ああ…だいじょうぶ…」
msg_en: `Teacher@❝...No... I'm good...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「その銅像はどっちに行きましたか？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Where'd the statue go?❞

msg_jp: `教師@「あ、あっち…」
msg_en: `Teacher@❝T-that way...❞

msg_jp: 指さす方向、地面に向けてライトを灯す。
msg_en: I flashed my light down on the ground.

msg_jp: なるほど、引きずった跡が残っていた。
msg_en: A heavy trail of something being dragged cut through the grass.

msg_jp: `理樹@「こっちだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Follow me.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うん」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Okay.❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは引きずった跡を慎重に追いかける。
msg_en: Rin and I cautiously traced the markings.

msg_jp: 月明かりは中庭を照らしているが、校舎の影はまったく見えない。
msg_en: The courtyard was bathed in moonlight, but we could not see into the dark of the school building's shadow.

msg_jp: 慎重にライトで照らしながら、進んでいく。
msg_en: We made our way forward slowly and carefully.

msg_jp: 足元には銅像で作られた跡があるから、こちら側に逃げたのは間違いないはずだ。
msg_en: According to the drag marks, we should be going in the right direction.
`Riki@(...Hm?)

msg_jp: なにか動いたような気がした。
msg_en: I thought I just saw something move.

msg_jp: だん！
msg_en: *Thwack*!

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわっ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

msg_jp: すぐ側で何かが弾けるような音が響く。
msg_en: A heavy bouncing sound came from somewhere nearby.

msg_jp: 転々とするのは、バスケットボール。
msg_en: A basketball rolled on the ground.

msg_jp: `声@「うらぁっ！」
msg_en: `Voice@❝Uraahh!❞

msg_jp: 吠えるような掛け声は真人だった！
msg_en: It was Masato shouting like a wild animal!

msg_jp: 背中に打撃が入った。
msg_en: Something hit me heavily on the back.

msg_jp: 鈴を庇うようにしながら転がる。
msg_en: I rolled over, protecting Rin.

msg_jp: 一瞬息が詰まるが、大したダメージじゃない。
msg_en: I could not breathe for a moment, though the damage wasn't severe.

msg_jp: `鈴@「だいじょうぶか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝You all right?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「うん…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Yeah...❞

msg_jp: 僕は鈴と一緒に立ち上がる。
msg_en: Rin and I stood up together.

msg_jp: `真人@「…一発でのされておきゃあ楽なものを」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...You should've let yourself get knocked down with that shot.❞

msg_jp: 銅像を引っ付けたままの真人が現れる。
msg_en: Masato showed himself, pulling along the body of the statue.

msg_jp: こんな…正対して勝てるわけがない。相手が片腕だとしても、あの真人だ。
msg_en: Jesus Christ... How could I possibly win a head-on fight against him? Even with his right hand sealed, he was still in another dimension of strength from me.

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴、一度引くっ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin, we're falling back!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「え？　わっ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Eh? Wah!❞

msg_jp: 鈴の手を引っ張るように、僕たちは真人から逃げ出した。
msg_en: I fled from Masato, pulling Rin by the hand.

msg_jp: あがった息を整えながら、校舎の影に隠れる。
msg_en: We hid in the shadow of the building, recovering our breath.

msg_jp: 周囲に引きずる音はしない。
msg_en: There weren't any dragging sounds.

msg_jp: 真人からの距離は稼げたはずだ。
msg_en: We should have gotten far enough from him.

msg_jp: だんっ！
msg_en: *Thwack!*

msg_jp: だんっ！
msg_en: *Thwack!*

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわっ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Uwah!❞

msg_jp: 僕たちに襲いかかるのは、またもや真人から投げられたバスケットボールだ。
msg_en: Masato was still sniping us with basketballs.

msg_jp: `鈴@「なんであいつわかるんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝How does he know where we are?❞

msg_jp: 僕は自分のうかつさに気づく。
msg_en: I noticed how careless I was being.

msg_jp: ライトが灯りっぱなしだ。
msg_en: I had forgotten to turn the light off.

msg_jp: それが、僕たちの場所を真人に教えていたんだ。
msg_en: That was how he knew our location.

msg_jp: `理樹@「ライト消すよ。真っ暗になるから、足下気をつけて」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We'll lose the light. Watch your step in the dark.❞

msg_jp: スイッチをスライドさせて消した。
msg_en: I switched the flashlight off.

msg_jp: `鈴@「暗いのもこわかったが…」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I used to be afraid of the dark as well...❞

msg_jp: 鈴が言う。
msg_en: She said.

msg_jp: `鈴@「それもなくなってきた」
msg_en: `Rin@❝But now I'm not really.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹がずっといてくれるからな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝It's because you're always with me, Riki.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「もちろん」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Of course I am.❞

msg_jp: 今度は、と思う。
msg_en: This time I must make it, I thought.

msg_jp: `鈴@「今はむしろたのしいな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I'm actually having fun now.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「でも、悠長にはしてられないよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝But we can't take our time here.❞

msg_jp: `声@「どこだ、おらあぁぁーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Voice@❝Where the hell are you! Goddammit!❞

msg_jp: 僕らを見失った真人の声。
msg_en: Losing sight of us, he shouted curses into the dark.

msg_jp: `鈴@「どうするんだ？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What are we gonna do?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「後ろから回り込もう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We're circling around behind him.❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは距離を取りながら、真人の足取りを追った。
msg_en: We would go after him from a safe distance.

msg_jp: ずず、と向こうから重々しい音が聞こえ、止まる。
msg_en: A heavy dragging sound reached our ears and then stopped again.

msg_jp: 見つからないように影から顔を出してみると…
msg_en: I carefully peeked out of the shadow to make sure...

msg_jp: `理樹@（…いた）
msg_en: `Riki@(...There he is.)

msg_jp: 銅像にもたれかかるようにして、座っている真人がいた。
msg_en: He was sitting on the ground, leaning on the statue.

msg_jp: いくら真人でも、あの銅像を持ったままこれだけ動いているんだ。体力はなくなっているはずだ。
msg_en: However tough he was, moving with the statue should have exhausted him completely.

msg_jp: 今なら…説得の余地があるかもしれない。
msg_en: This... might be the best chance I'd get at persuasion.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato.❞

msg_jp: 僕は話しかける。
msg_en: I spoke up to him.

msg_jp: `真人@「現れやがったか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝So you showed up.❞

msg_jp: その腰を上げる。
msg_en: He got to his feet.

msg_jp: `理樹@「待って、もう疲れてるでしょ？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Keep sitting. You must be really tired.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「いいや」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Not at all.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕には…もう、真人に勝ち目は…ない気がするんだ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I feel like... you already have no more chance... to win against us...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「これ以上はやりあいたくないっていうか…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I don't really feel like continuing this anymore...❞

msg_jp: なんて自信のない説得だ…。
msg_en: My words sounded hollow even to my own ears...

msg_jp: `真人@「は、笑わせるな。そんなのてめぇの逃げ口上じゃねぇか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hah, don't make me laugh. That's just your freaking escape line.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「逃げるなら逃げろ。その代わり二度と現れるな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If you wanna flee, then do it. However, don't you ever show me that face again.❞

msg_jp: いや、逃げるわけにはいかない。
msg_en: No, running was never an option for me.

msg_jp: やっぱり、やるしかないのか…。
msg_en: So in the end, I could only fight him...

msg_jp: …だが、改めて見ても、この体格差は大きすぎる。
msg_en: But the gap between our physiques was way too huge.

msg_jp: いくら片腕を封じたとしてもまだ足りない。
msg_en: Even though one of his arms was rendered useless, it wasn't enough of a handicap to make us evenly matched.

msg_jp: …闇討ちしかない。
msg_en: ...I could only rely on a sneak attack.

msg_jp: `理樹@「…真人、悪いけど、次はやるよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...Sorry, Masato, but I'll get you with the next one.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「ああ…望むところだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Sure... Bring it on.❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは、もう一度闇に紛れた。
msg_en: Rin and I withdrew back into the darkness.

msg_jp: 中庭から真人の姿が消える。
msg_en: Masato's figure left the courtyard.

msg_jp: たとえ今の真人が全速力で走ったとしても、僕よりも遅い。
msg_en: Even if he ran as fast as he could now, we were still faster than him.

msg_jp: 地面に残された跡は、中庭からグラウンドへ続く道を示している。
msg_en: The drag marks left on the ground were leading us toward the sports grounds.

msg_jp: 曲がり角でぶつかったのか、木々の枝が何本か折れていた。
msg_en: There were some broken branches at the corner; they must've fallen as he passed by.

msg_jp: `理樹@「あっ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Ah!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「ん？　どうした」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Hm? What's wrong?❞

msg_jp: 地面から、跡が消えていた。
msg_en: The drag marks ended.

msg_jp: グラウンドへの道は広く、隠れられる場所はない。
msg_en: The path to the fields was so broad that there was no place to hide.

msg_jp: 周囲には誰もいない…。
msg_en: Yet there was no one around here either...

msg_jp: `理樹@「…ひょっとして」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...It's hard to believe, but...❞

msg_jp: それしか考えられない。
msg_en: There was only one reasonable explanation I could think of.

msg_jp: 僕は、真人を見くびっていたのかもしれない。
msg_en: I might have underestimated him still.

msg_jp: `理樹@「たぶん、真人は銅像を持ち上げたんだ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...Masato must have lifted up the statue.❞

msg_jp: あんな巨大な金属の塊を持ち上げるなんて、予想もしてなかった。
msg_en: I never had even imagined he could hold up such an immense chunk of metal.

msg_jp: これで、追う方法はなくなった。
msg_en: We'd lost our only way of tracking him.

msg_jp: そして、ほんの少しだけ、僕たちが持っていた有利さを失うことも意味していた。
msg_en: And we had handed over the one advantage that we'd had.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人を見失った…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We lost his tracks completely...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「今は逃げよう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We'd better run for now.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「こんな場所をうろついていたら、逆に返り討ちに遭う」
msg_en: `Riki@❝If we keep wandering around here, we're just gonna give him a good chance to attack us.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹っ、うしろ！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Riki, behind you!❞

msg_jp: 音もなく、黒い大きな影が迫るのを見た。
msg_en: I spun around and caught a fleeting view of a huge shadow closing in on me.

msg_jp: `声@「ぅおらああぁぁーっっ!!!」
msg_en: `Voice@❝UORAAAAAAHH!!!❞

msg_jp: どずんっっ!!
msg_en: *CRASH*!!

msg_jp: 鈴に飛びつくようにして転がりながらかわすと、校内全てに響き渡るような重低音が襲ってきた。
msg_en: A deep, low sound echoed off the walls after I jumped and rolled on the ground with Rin in my arms.

msg_jp: `理樹@「うわ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Jesus...❞

msg_jp: 銅像の重さをも加えた、全体重をかけた拳の威力を今知った。
msg_en: I just saw first-hand how destructive his blow became when the weight of the statue was added to his brute strength.

msg_jp: あんなのを喰らったら倒れるどころか…。
msg_en: If you received a hit, the results would definitely be way beyond going unconscious...

msg_jp: `鈴@「このっ！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Take this!❞

msg_jp: 鈴は手近にあったゴミ箱を真人に投げつけた。
msg_en: Rin hurled a nearby trash bin at Masato.

msg_jp: `真人@「おわっ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Owah!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いまのうちだっ！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Now run!❞

msg_jp: `真人@「まてやぁっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Wait the hell up!❞

msg_jp: 逃げ出した僕たちを、真人が追ってくる。
msg_en: Masato was coming after us.

msg_jp: …遠くに真人の声だけが聞こえていた。
msg_en: ...However, he couldn't catch up with us; his shouting voice alone resounded from afar.

msg_jp: `鈴@「…にげてばっかだな」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...We've been doing nothing but running.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「そうだね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝That's true.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「ほんとに倒せるのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Do you really think we can take him down?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「考えがあるんだけど」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I have an idea.❞

msg_jp: どこをどう逃げたかわからなくなっていたが、ひとつ思い出したことがあった。
msg_en: I didn't know what routes we had taken while running, but I had remembered one thing.

msg_jp: `理樹@「ここに逃げ込んだのも、その考えがあってね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We came in here to carry it out.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「なんだそれは？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝What is it?❞

msg_jp: 僕たちは体育倉庫にいた。
msg_en: We were in front of the P.E. storeroom.

msg_jp: 窓の鍵が壊れていることを、ふと思い出し、作戦を立てた。
msg_en: What I'd remembered was that the lock on its window was broken, and that had allowed me to work out a strategy.

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴にしてほしいことがあるんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin, there's something I'd like you to help with.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うん、理樹のためならなんでもするぞ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Sure, I'll do anything for you, Riki.❞

msg_jp: そんなことを易々と答えられると、ちょっとどきどきする…。
msg_en: Hearing that reply without the slightest hesitation caused my heart to skip a few beats...

msg_jp: `理樹@「じゃ、これを持って、南校舎の２階に行ってくれないかな」
msg_en: `Riki@❝All right then, will you take this and head up to the second floor of the south building?❞

msg_jp: 僕は丸められた網目状のものを手にしながら、言った。
msg_en: I asked with a rolled-up thing in my hand.

msg_jp: `理樹@「バレーボールのネットを、２階の窓から真人に落として欲しいんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I want you to throw this volleyball net on Masato from a window up there.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「そうすれば、いくら真人でも簡単には動けなくなる」
msg_en: `Riki@❝That will make it really hard for him to move.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「そーかんたんにいくのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Are you sure it'll be that easy?❞

msg_jp: 策は出来る限り講じる。
msg_en: I was going to do whatever it took.

msg_jp: 頭と体を使うんだ。
msg_en: I was using both my head and body.

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕が囮になる」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll be a decoy.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人を挑発して、体力を削るんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝And rile him up to make him tired.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「その間、僕は逃げ切ってみせる」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll do that without letting him catch me.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴は、チャンスを逃さないように待っててほしい」
msg_en: `Riki@❝And Rin, I really need you to not miss the chance when it comes.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「たぶんよくても２回くらいしかないと思うから」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'll probably only be able to get you two opportunities at best.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「…わかった」
msg_en: `Rin@❝...Got it.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「がんばれ、理樹」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Good luck, Riki.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴もね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Good luck to you too, Rin.❞

msg_jp: ちりん、と頷いてみせた。
msg_en: A cling of the bell followed her nod.

msg_jp: バレーボールのネットから、ワイヤーを抜いておく。
msg_en: I removed the wire from the net.

msg_jp: さすがにこのままだと鈴ひとりでは持ち運べないからだ。
msg_en: Otherwise it would be a little too much for her to carry by herself.

msg_jp: それと、体育館の天幕を支えるおもりをいくつかつけ、ネットが広がりやすいように細工する。
msg_en: I then attached some weights from the stage curtains on the edges to make it spread out more easily.

msg_jp: 体育倉庫の扉を開けると、月光がまぶしく感じられた。
msg_en: As I opened the storeroom door, the moonlight felt bright to my eyes.

msg_jp: 暗闇の中に居続けたからだろうか。
msg_en: It must be because I had stayed in the dark for so long.

msg_jp: 南校舎までは廊下をはさんですぐ。
msg_en: The south building was right over there across the connecting corridor.

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕が出て行って、真人が反応したらあそこに駆け込むんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You'll dash into the building after I draw Masato's attention.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「わかった」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Got it.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「じゃ、後で」
msg_en: `Riki@❝We'll see each other later.❞

msg_jp: 僕は全速力で中庭まで駆け出した。
msg_en: I ran at top speed to the courtyard.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人！　どこにいるんだ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato! Where are you!❞

msg_jp: 精一杯の大声で叫んだ。
msg_en: I called out as loudly as I could.

msg_jp: 声もなく北校舎の側から、黒い影が浮かび上がる。
msg_en: Without uttering a word, a black figure emerged from the direction of the north building.

msg_jp: よかった。鈴はいけそうだ。
msg_en: Thank god, Rin's gonna make it.

msg_jp: 目の端に、鈴が南校舎に入る姿が見えた。
msg_en: I witnessed her slip into the south building out of the corner of my eye.

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕はここだよ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'm right here!❞

msg_jp: 言って、テニスコートの方向へと逃げ出した。
msg_en: Having revealed my location, I headed for the tennis courts,

msg_jp: 決して真人の視界から外れないようにしながら。
msg_en: being careful not to vanish out of his sight.

msg_jp: 間合いが遠い、とわかっていても、恐怖で体が冷えてしまう。
msg_en: In spite of knowing I was far enough from him, my body was shaking from fear.

msg_jp: また、今も、地面が震動で揺らいだ。
msg_en: Once again I felt the ground quake.

msg_jp: `真人@「ちっ、こそこそと逃げ回りやがって…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Dammit, running around so sneakily...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレなら正々堂々と戦いやがれ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If it's me, he should just fight fair and square...❞

msg_jp: 荒い息を吐いていたが、まだ足取りはしっかりしている。
msg_en: Though his breathing was heavy, he was still steady on his legs.

msg_jp: 筋トレでついていたのは筋力だけじゃなかったんだ。
msg_en: It didn't seem to be just his muscles that he had been building,

msg_jp: 体力も。そんなに鍛えなくても、よかったのに。
msg_en: but his stamina as well. Now I really wished he hadn't.

msg_jp: `理樹@「こっちだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Over here.❞

msg_jp: 角を曲がり、中庭へ続く路地をひた走る。
msg_en: I turned a corner and sped along a path which led to the courtyard.

msg_jp: `真人@「待ちやがれ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Stop right there!❞

msg_jp: 全速力で逃げて、ようやく距離が離れる。
msg_en: At the last moment, I launched into full speed and put some distance between us.

msg_jp: ある程度間が空くと僕は止まり、真人を待つ。
msg_en: Each time he fell too far back, I waited for him to get close to me again.

msg_jp: 肩に担いだ銅像はそのままだ。
msg_en: The statue was still attached tightly to Masato.

msg_jp: 真人は、その銅像を体ごと巻き込むようにしてくる。
msg_en: He was carrying it over his shoulder.

msg_jp: 体重ごと乗せた攻撃は、立ちはだかるものすべてを壊している。
msg_en: His boosted attacks destroyed everything in their path.

msg_jp: 足がすくみそうになる。
msg_en: It was almost enough to petrify me.

msg_jp: だけど、止まったら終わりなんだ。
msg_en: Nonetheless, stopping meant the end of the road.

msg_jp: 逃げなくちゃいけない。けど、逃げすぎてもいけない。
msg_en: I had to run, but I also had to stay within a certain distance from him.

msg_jp: まるで薄い塀の上に立ってバランスをとっているみたいだ。
msg_en: It felt as if I was balancing myself on a tightrope.

msg_jp: 真人を走らせて、攻撃を空振りさせて、体力を削り取る。
msg_en: Making Masato run, strike at the air and exhaust himself.

msg_jp: 恐怖心を押さえ込め。
msg_en: I struggled viciously to suppress my fear.

msg_jp: 冷静に当たらないところまで進み、ひとつずつかわす。
msg_en: To cool-headedly step into his reach, and avoid every attack he launched.

msg_jp: 危ないと思えば、逃げればいい。
msg_en: If I judged myself to be in danger, I ran.

msg_jp: 真人の動きが止まれば、近寄り挑発する。
msg_en: When Masato paused, I got closer to provoke him.

msg_jp: 機械のように繰り返せばいい。
msg_en: All I had to do was repeat that process with machine-like precision.

msg_jp: 中庭の見通しのいい場所に出た。
msg_en: I ended up in an area of the courtyard with a good view around me.

msg_jp: 真人が見えなくなって５分くらい。
msg_en: I hadn't seen Masato for some five minutes now.

msg_jp: 目に見えて動きが鈍くなっていた。
msg_en: His movements had been slowing discernibly.

msg_jp: たぶん今はどこかで休んでいるのだろう。
msg_en: He was probably taking a rest somewhere.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人？　どこ行ったの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato? Where are you?❞

msg_jp: 暗闇に声をかける。
msg_en: I threw a question into the darkness.

msg_jp: `理樹@「でておいでよ。もう逃げないからさ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Come on out. I won't run anymore.❞

msg_jp: 僕は慎重に、近くの自販機でスポーツドリンクを買った。
msg_en: I cautiously bought a sports drink at the nearby vending machine.

msg_jp: がしゃん、と思いのほか大きな音を立てて、缶が出てくる。
msg_en: The sound of the dropping can was unbelievably loud.

msg_jp: 一口飲んで、あまりのおいしさにびっくりした。
msg_en: I couldn't believe how delicious the drink tasted.

msg_jp: 緊張で気付かなかったが、もう体力の限界が近い。
msg_en: Tension seemed to have prevented me from noticing that I too had nearly reached my physical limit.

msg_jp: `理樹@（…真人も喉がかわいてるんだろうなぁ）
msg_en: `Riki@(...Masato must be thirsty, too.)

msg_jp: そう思うと後ろめたさが沸く。
msg_en: I felt a sense of guilt about it.

msg_jp: けど…
msg_en: Yet...

msg_jp: がさり。
msg_en: *Rustle*.

msg_jp: 音の方向へ集中する。
msg_en: I turned all my attention in the direction from which the sound had come.

msg_jp: ゆらり、と雲が湧いたように真人が現れた。
msg_en: Slowly, like a drifting cloud, Masato emerged into view.

msg_jp: 銅像はもう抱えていない。
msg_en: He was now too tired to hold the statue up any longer.

msg_jp: 過呼吸を起こした息はいまだ整わず、今にも倒れそうなくらいだ。
msg_en: His breathing hadn't recovered yet; he looked ready to topple over at any moment.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人、もう降参してくれないかな？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato, won't you admit defeat already?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…るせぇ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Shaddap.❞

msg_jp: ゆっくりと移動する。
msg_en: I decided to slowly move over.

msg_jp: ここは場所が悪い。
msg_en: My current location wasn't good.

msg_jp: 思ったとおり、真人はすぐには動かないようだ。
msg_en: As expected, Masato didn't attack me immediately.

msg_jp: 予想した位置について、正対に構えた。
msg_en: I arrived in position and faced him.

msg_jp: 南校舎の窓は開いている。
msg_en: One of the windows above was already open.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「るせぇんだよ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up!❞

msg_jp: 吐き捨てるように言いながら、真人は銅像を抱え上げた。
msg_en: He spit and lifted the statue up.

msg_jp: 右腕一本だけの力で。
msg_en: With his right arm alone.

msg_jp: 僕は、真人がどれだけ鍛えていたか、よく知っている。
msg_en: I knew very well how he worked out.

msg_jp: …それでも。
msg_en: ...However.

msg_jp: 僕は、本気の真人を見たことがなかった。
msg_en: Even I had never seen him release everything he had.

msg_jp: `真人@「勝負だ。もう逃げんじゃねえぞ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Time for a real battle. Don't even think of running anymore.❞

msg_jp: 一歩ずつ、ゆっくりと近づいてくる。
msg_en: Step by slow step, he was drawing closer to me.

msg_jp: 間合いはあと、数歩。
msg_en: Just when he was but a handful of steps away from me...

msg_jp: `理樹@「もう逃げない」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I'm not running anymore.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「だって、もうすぐ終わるから」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Because this will be over soon enough.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴！　いまだ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin! Do it!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「うりゃっ！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Uryah!❞

msg_jp: 声と同時に、中空に黒い網が舞った。
msg_en: With a loud cry, she launched the black net into the air.
`Masato@❝!?❞

msg_jp: 真人の声にならない声。
msg_en: Masato opened his mouth, but no voice came out.

msg_jp: ネットがその体を絡み取る。
msg_en: And then he was tangled in the net.

msg_jp: `鈴@「やった！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Score!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「理樹、今だ、いけ！」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Riki! Now's your chance, go!❞

msg_jp: その声に押されるように走った。
msg_en: As if being pushed ahead by her call, I took off running.

msg_jp: 初めての喧嘩だ。
msg_en: This was the first fight of my life.

msg_jp: それも親友との。
msg_en: And it was against one of my best friends.

msg_jp: どむっ。
msg_en: *Ka-thunk*.

msg_jp: お腹に肘を入れた。
msg_en: I elbowed him in the abdomen.
`Masato@❝Ugh...❞

msg_jp: なんて固い腹筋だ！
msg_en: His abs were like steel!

msg_jp: 怯まず、続けざまに拳を何度も叩きつける。
msg_en: Without getting overwhelmed, I kept on attacking.

msg_jp: 真人の左腕が伸びてくる。
msg_en: His left arm was coming for me.

msg_jp: さっと飛び退いた。
msg_en: I quickly jumped back a pace.

msg_jp: それより先にはネットが邪魔で寄ってこれない。
msg_en: The net didn't allow him to reach me.

msg_jp: `理樹@「もう終わりだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝It's over.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「今度は背中からいくよ。振り返ることすらままならないでしょ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Next I'll hit you from behind. You shouldn't even be able to turn around now.❞

msg_jp: 伸ばした左腕がネットを掴んだ。
msg_en: His extended arm gripped the net.

msg_jp: `真人@「うおりゃーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uoryaaaahhhh!!!❞

msg_jp: 気合一閃。
msg_en: It was an outrageous burst of fighting spirit.

msg_jp: 小気味いいほどの音を立てて、ネットが破られていく…。
msg_en: With a loud sound, the net was getting torn apart...

msg_jp: 可能なんだ、そんなこと…。
msg_en: How was that even possible...?

msg_jp: 型破りすぎるよ…。
msg_en: It was way too unthinkable...

msg_jp: `真人@「…ふう」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Phew.❞

msg_jp: 銅像に絡みついた部分は、もう何の効力もないのか、ぶんと振り回して力任せに解いた。
msg_en: It was as though the statue no longer weighed him down; he swung his arms around and broke free from the net.

msg_jp: `真人@「これで終わりか？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You out of tricks now?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「…そうだね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...Yes.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「もう手はないよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I have no more tricks.❞

msg_jp: 簡単に覚悟が決まった。
msg_en: It only took me a moment to prepare myself.

msg_jp: 今まで逃げ回っていた自分に飽きたのだろう。
msg_en: I must have been sick of running too.

msg_jp: 自分でも様になっていないと思える構えを取る。
msg_en: I assumed a fighting stance which I was sure was far from perfect.

msg_jp: `真人@「…ほう、ようやくその気になったか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Good, we're finally on the same page.❞

msg_jp: 僕はためらうことなく、肩口から突っ込んだ。
msg_en: Without even thinking, I rushed toward him.

msg_jp: 何度目のタックルだろう。
msg_en: I didn't know how many tackles I had given him by now.

msg_jp: 真人の上体が揺らぐ。
msg_en: But this one managed to sway his upper body.

msg_jp: そのまま、お腹に拳を叩き込む。
msg_en: Immediately after, I punched him in the stomach.

msg_jp: `真人@「きかねぇなっ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝That's nothing for me.❞

msg_jp: いや、効いているはずだ。
msg_en: No, he must be bluffing.

msg_jp: もう足下も覚束ないほどに疲弊しきっている。
msg_en: He was obviously too tired to even stay steady on his feet.

msg_jp: そこへ死にものぐるいの僕の攻撃。
msg_en: In addition to that, he had taken my desperate tackle head-on.

msg_jp: ひ弱でも体が小さくても…後わずかな体力を削っていってるはずだ。
msg_en: Even though I was small and light... I should have been able to reduce his remaining stamina.

msg_jp: 不意に右腕をつかまれ、振り回される。
msg_en: All of a sudden, he grabbed hold of my right arm and swung me around.

msg_jp: 数メートル転がっただろうか、そのまま校舎の壁にぶつかってしまった。
msg_en: After rolling on the ground for several meters, I crashed onto the wall of the school building.

msg_jp: `理樹@「ぐぅ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Ugh...❞

msg_jp: 息ができない。
msg_en: I could not draw in breath.

msg_jp: 体中が痛い。
msg_en: My entire body was killing me.

msg_jp: でも、起きなきゃ。
msg_en: Yet I had to get up.

msg_jp: 立ち上がって、真人に挑むんだ。
msg_en: I had to stand up and fight him.

msg_jp: 必死の思いで構えると、真人はその場から動いていなかった。
msg_en: I desperately poised myself for the next attack, but Masato was still in the same position.

msg_jp: 抱え込んだ銅像を降ろし、ただ僕を睨みつけている。
msg_en: He was just glaring at me, with the statue on the ground.

msg_jp: 真人の膝が揺れていた。
msg_en: His knees were wobbling.

msg_jp: `理樹@（あと少しだ…）
msg_en: `Riki@(Just one more push...)

msg_jp: 頑張れ。自分を叱咤する。
msg_en: Keep it up, I encouraged myself.

msg_jp: そこに信じられない光景が。
msg_en: In the next moment, something unbelievable happened.

msg_jp: 黒い影が、真上から降ってきた。
msg_en: A black figure fell from right above.
...Rin!

msg_jp: 真人の肩口に体重をかけた膝を落とした。
msg_en: She kneed him on the shoulder with her full weight behind it.

msg_jp: そして、ふわっと地面に飛び降りる。
msg_en: Then she jumped up nimbly and landed softly on the ground.

msg_jp: 鈴は僕を見ていた。
msg_en: She was looking at me.

msg_jp: いけ、と。
msg_en: Her eyes told me to go.

msg_jp: 真人がその鈴に向けて手を伸ばす。
msg_en: Masato stretched out his arm toward her.

msg_jp: 急げ。
msg_en: I had to hurry.

msg_jp: 鈴が作ってくれた隙だ。
msg_en: She'd managed this chance for me.

msg_jp: すべてをこの一撃に賭けろ。
msg_en: I had to put all I had into this one tackle.

msg_jp: 土手っ腹に肘。
msg_en: My elbow connected with his stomach.

msg_jp: 怯んでいたのか、今度は腹筋は張っていない。
msg_en: Due to the recoil from before, he didn't tense his muscles this time.

msg_jp: 深々とそれは入った。
msg_en: Thanks to that, my elbow went deep into his body.

msg_jp: 真人は堪えきれず、身を折り、嗚咽を漏らす。
msg_en: Unable to bear it, he stooped and moaned in pain.

msg_jp: …それでも倒れない。
msg_en: ...But still he wouldn't fall.

msg_jp: どうしてだ…。
msg_en: Why...

msg_jp: もう倒れればいいのに。
msg_en: You don't have to keep standing.

msg_jp: ほら、もう鈴へと伸ばした手さえも、力なく垂れ下がっている。
msg_en: Even his left hand, still stretched toward Rin, just hung there powerlessly.

msg_jp: それを上げる体力すら残っていないんだ。
msg_en: He must have been too worn down to even keep it uplifted.

msg_jp: `鈴@「立ったまま気絶してるのか？」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Did he faint while standing?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No...❞

msg_jp: 僕は首を振る。
msg_en: I shook my head in denial.

msg_jp: まだ意識はある。
msg_en: He still remained conscious.

msg_jp: 何か遠くを見据えている。
msg_en: He was just staring somewhere far away.

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人、どうして倒れないの…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Masato, why do you keep standing...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「ここでオレが倒れたら…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I go down here...❞

msg_jp: 開きっぱなしの口から弱々しい声を漏らす。
msg_en: A weak, rasping voice leaked out of his mouth.

msg_jp: `真人@「オレがオレでなくなっちまうじゃねぇか…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I won't be myself anymore...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「違う、真人」
msg_en: `Riki@❝That's not true, Masato.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「強くなかったらオレじゃねぇ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I'm not strong, it's not me...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「それしかオレがオレであることを証明し続けられねぇ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Being strong is my only way of proving that I am myself...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「どうしてだよ、真人」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Why, Masato?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「強くなくたっていいじゃないか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You don't have to be strong.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「ダメなんだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Yes, I do...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「何を恐れてるの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝What do you fear?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレじゃなくなるオレだ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝The me that'll stop being myself...❞

msg_jp: 携帯の着信音が鳴る。
msg_en: My mobile plays the familiar ringtone.

msg_jp: ディスプレイには『直枝理樹』。
msg_en: The name on the display reads ❛Riki Naoe.❜

msg_jp: …早いな。
msg_en: ...That was fast.

msg_jp: 通話ボタンを押し、肩に挟む。
msg_en: I push the talk button and wedge the phone between my ear and shoulder.

msg_jp: `真人@「あいよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Yeah.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@『僕だけど…』
msg_en: `Riki@[It's me...]

msg_jp: `真人@「わかってるよ、なんだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I know. What is it?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@『今から部屋に来てくれない？　話があるんだ』
msg_en: `Riki@[Will you come over to our room? I've got something to tell you.]

msg_jp: `真人@「…ああ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...'Kay.❞

msg_jp: それだけのやり取りで電話を切った。
msg_en: The conversation is over quickly and I hang up the phone.

msg_jp: 部屋には、ふたりが肩を並べていた。鈴の隣には猫までいる。
msg_en: As I arrive in the room, I find Rin and Riki next to each other. There is even a cat by her side.

msg_jp: まるで、慎ましく暮らす家族のように見えた。
msg_en: They look just like a small family living a modest life.

msg_jp: `真人@「仲良さそうにやってんな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You guys seem to be getting along pretty well.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「とりあえず、座ってよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Anyway, have a seat.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「じゃ、失礼するぜ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝All right, excuse me then.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「失礼も何も、自分の部屋じゃないか」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Excuse you for what? This is your room, too.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「そういやそうだったな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Yeah, of course it is.❞

msg_jp: 段ボール製のちゃぶ台を挟んだ正面に座る。
msg_en: I sit down, facing them with the cardboard table between us.

msg_jp: `理樹@「今日も帰ってこないつもりだったの？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝You weren't going to come back again today if I didn't call you?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…そうだな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...No.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「どうして？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Why not?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「そんなことを訊くために呼んだのか？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Did you call me here just to ask that?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「もちろん、それも関係あることだよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Of course, that's one of the reasons.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「なんだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What's the rest?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「僕は鈴とふたりでリトルバスターズを作ったんだ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Rin and I have just formed the Little Busters.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「ほぉ…それで？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hoh... so?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「真人も仲間に入ってよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Join us.❞

msg_jp: 安易だ…。
msg_en: That is way too easy...

msg_jp: オレは顔を伏せる。
msg_en: I cast my face down.

msg_jp: わざわざ降りてやったんだから、それなりに苦労してもらう必要があんだよ、理樹。
msg_en: If you don't overcome some trouble for yourself, there's no point in me having left you, Riki.

msg_jp: `理樹@「そうすれば、今まで通りこの部屋で一緒に過ごせる」
msg_en: `Riki@❝If you become one of us, we'll be able to live in this room again like before.❞

msg_jp: その苦労がなんだかは、自分のことだからオレにもよくわからないがな。
msg_en: Though what kind of trouble that will be I can't tell, because I'm going to be the source of it.

msg_jp: `理樹@「…ほら、鈴からも言ってやってよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝...Rin, you say something to him as well.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「またいっしょにあそぼう」
msg_en: `Rin@❝Let's play together again.❞

msg_jp: ほぅ…そんなことが言えるまで回復したのか。
msg_en: Wow... she's recovered enough to say something like that.

msg_jp: よくもまあ、あの状態の鈴をここまで…感服するぜ。
msg_en: I can't believe you've cured her this well... I'm seriously impressed.

msg_jp: それはオレたちには無理だっただろう。
msg_en: I'm certain that it would've been impossible for us.

msg_jp: よくやってるよ、理樹、おまえは。
msg_en: You are doing a great job, Riki, I really mean it.

msg_jp: オレは顔を上げる。
msg_en: I raise my head.

msg_jp: `真人@「悪いが…お断りだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Sorry... but the answer is no.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「えぇ？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Ehh?❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「そーか残念だ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝I see. That's a pity.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「鈴も簡単に引き下がらないでよっ！」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Don't give up that easily, Rin!❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「こいつなんか鬼こわい」
msg_en: `Rin@❝But he looks scary as hell.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「話は終わりか？　じゃ、オレはいくぜ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Are you done yet? If so, I'm outta here.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いやいや、ちょっと待ってよっ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No, no, wait a second!❞

msg_jp: 腰を上げようとしたところで呼び止められる。
msg_en: He begs as I am about to stand up.

msg_jp: 理樹は頭を掻きむしって、鈴のほうを向いたり、オレのほうを向いたりしている。
msg_en: Scratching his head, his eyes flicker between me and Rin.

msg_jp: `真人@「なんだよ、落ち着けよ、おまえ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What's wrong with you? You'd better calm down...❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いいたいことがあるなら、はっきり言え」
msg_en: `Rin@❝If you've got something to say, just say it.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや、こいつ鬼こわいとか、鈴みたいにはっきり言えないよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝I can't put it as straight as your 'he looks scary as hell,' Rin...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「早く終わらせてくれねぇかな…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Will you please get this done already...❞

msg_jp: 考えろ、理樹。
msg_en: Think it over, Riki.

msg_jp: そんな簡単にリトルバスターズはできねぇんだよ。
msg_en: You're going to have to put in much more effort than that to complete the Little Busters.

msg_jp: `理樹@「じゃあ、理由を教えてよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Then tell me why.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「え？　断る理由か？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Eh? Why I decline?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「そう」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…そうだな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Well.❞

msg_jp: 古い記憶を辿る。
msg_en: I trace my old memories.

msg_jp: あの日、オレはこう考えていたはずだ。
msg_en: Back then, this should've been what I believed.

msg_jp: `真人@「オレが最強だからだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝'Cause I'm the strongest.❞

msg_jp: `鈴@「いや、おまえ謙吾よりよわいだろ」
msg_en: `Rin@❝No, you're weaker than Kengo.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「るせえぇ、オレは最強だああぁぁーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up, I'm the bloody strongest!!❞

msg_jp: 鈴が驚いて体を小さくする。
msg_en: She shrinks back, shocked.

msg_jp: おっと、恐がらせちまったか。
msg_en: Oops, I didn't mean to frighten her.

msg_jp: `真人@「もういいか？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Can I go?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「いや、待って…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No, hold on...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「まだあるのか？　なんだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Not yet? Now what?❞

msg_jp: 悟れ、理樹。
msg_en: Realize it, Riki.

msg_jp: 今は無駄なんだよ。
msg_en: There's nothing you can do about this.

msg_jp: `真人@「いくぜ？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I'm going.❞

msg_jp: こんな空気の中で長居はしたくない。オレは立ち上がる。
msg_en: I can't take being in this sort of atmosphere any longer, so I stand up.

msg_jp: 理樹は、呼び止めることもできなかった。
msg_en: Riki cannot even call me to a halt.

msg_jp: 当然だ。おまえが苦労するのはこれからなんだからな。
msg_en: That's how it should be. The hardships are still ahead.

msg_jp: それはどれほどのものだろう？
msg_en: How tough will it be, I wonder?

msg_jp: あの日、理樹は、『強く生きる』ことを誓った。
msg_en: That day, he swore to ❛become stronger.❜

msg_jp: でも、まだ恭介ほど強くはない。
msg_en: But he isn't as strong as Kyousuke yet.

msg_jp: できれば危険な目に遭わせたくない。
msg_en: If possible, I don't want to put him in danger.

msg_jp: だから理樹、これは忠告だ。
msg_en: So take this advice from me to heart, Riki.

msg_jp: `真人@「…オレはたぶんこれから最強を証明し始めるだろう」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Guess it's soon time for me to start proving that I'm the strongest.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「怪我したくなかったら近づくんじゃねぇぞ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If you don't wanna get hurt, stay away from me...❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「え？　それってどういう意味っ？」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Eh? What's that supposed to mean?❞

msg_jp: ばたん。ドアを閉めた。
msg_en: I close the door behind me.

msg_jp: 自分で言っておきながら、一体これから何が起きるか、具体的なことはわからねぇ。
msg_en: Although I said that myself, I have no specific idea of what's going to happen.

msg_jp: でもこれが本当に始まりだとしたら…
msg_en: But if this really is the beginning...

msg_jp: 結構な大事（おおごと）になるぜ。
msg_en: it won't be anything minor.

msg_jp: あの日のオレは、闇雲に強さだけを求めて生きていたからな…。
msg_en: Back then, I was just blindly seeking to be strong...

msg_jp: ベンチまでやってくると、そこに体を横たえる。
msg_en: I lie down on a bench.

msg_jp: そして目を閉じた。
msg_en: And I close my eyes.

msg_jp: オレの思考は他人とずれがあるらしく、よく周りを引かせていた。
msg_en: Because my way of thinking was slightly different from theirs, people around me often found it weird.

msg_jp: そのずれを世間では『馬鹿』というらしい。
msg_en: They described that gap as ❛idiocy,❜ as I learned.

msg_jp: その『馬鹿』はどれだけ努力しても埋まらなかった。
msg_en: No matter how hard I tried, I could not make up for that ❛idiocy.❜

msg_jp: それを世間では『天然』というらしい。
msg_en: And they found that ❛idiocy❜ entertaining, as I learned.

msg_jp: 天然の馬鹿だったオレは、それを理由に小さい頃から笑われてきた。
msg_en: Because of being born an idiot, those around me had been laughing ever since I was little.

msg_jp: あれは嘲笑だ。
msg_en: No, they had been sneering at me.

msg_jp: その言葉は知らなくても、小さいオレは感づいていた。
msg_en: I didn't know how to put it into words back then, but I did realize it.

msg_jp: 学級のみんなが楽しく笑っていても、オレひとりは楽しくなかったからだ。
msg_en: Because I alone didn't have any fun when everyone else in the class was laughing merrily.

msg_jp: 胸くそ悪い感じだ。
msg_en: It was the worst feeling.

msg_jp: 友達もできず…浮いた存在でいた。
msg_en: I had no friends... I was all alone.

msg_jp: 『のど乾いたときに牛乳のむんだぜ、こいつ』
msg_en: ❛Did you know? He still drinks milk when he's thirsty.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『また靴脱がせて、はかせてみよーぜ』
msg_en: ❛Let's take his shoes off and make him put them on again.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『一回転すんだぜ』
msg_en: ❛He spins around while putting them on.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『わざとじゃねーの？』
msg_en: ❛Isn't that on purpose?❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『それが素だから笑えんだよ』
msg_en: ❛It's not, and that's what makes it so funny.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: ある時オレはキレて、リーダー格の奴を拳で殴ってやった。
msg_en: At one point, I threw a fit and punched the leader kid.

msg_jp: まだひ弱だったけど、当たり所が悪かったらしく、そいつは気を失うようにして膝から崩れ落ちた。
msg_en: Though I wasn't strong at all, my blow seemed to hit a critical spot and he collapsed, unconscious.

msg_jp: 次の瞬間、静寂というものが訪れた。
msg_en: And the next thing I noticed was the silence surrounding me.

msg_jp: 笑ってる奴はいなくなった。
msg_en: No one was laughing anymore.

msg_jp: 黙らせてやることができた。
msg_en: I had succeeded in shutting their mouths.

msg_jp: それを可能にしたのは力だった。
msg_en: And what had achieved it was power.

msg_jp: なるほど、笑われないためには、強くなればいいのか。
msg_en: It was then that I realized it. Nobody would laugh at me as long as I was strong.

msg_jp: そう悟り、オレはその日から、闇雲に体を鍛え上げていった。
msg_en: From that day on, I began to hone my body with desperation.

msg_jp: やがて誰よりも強くなった。
msg_en: Soon I was stronger than anyone else in the class.

msg_jp: 笑う奴はいなくなったが、オレは浮いたままの存在でいた。
msg_en: Nobody made fun of me, but I was still all alone.

msg_jp: 進級して、新しい奴らと出会おうとも、誰もオレと馴染めないでいた。
msg_en: Even when I went up a grade and met new kids, I had trouble getting along with them.

msg_jp: ああ、オレの居場所はここじゃないんだな。
msg_en: Ah, this is not the place where I belong.

msg_jp: それはきっと、オレより強い奴らの居るところなんだ。
msg_en: Most likely, it must be where there are others stronger than me.

msg_jp: オレはそこから自分の居場所を探し始めたんだ。
msg_en: From there, I decided to start searching for the right place for me.

msg_jp: 目覚めたのは、裏庭の倉庫の中だ。
msg_en: I wake up inside the backyard storeroom.

msg_jp: なんでかというと、ここで寝たからだ。
msg_en: Why am I in here? It's because I was sleeping here.

msg_jp: 最初は表のベンチで寝ていたが、深夜になって急に寒くなり、その中に避難した。
msg_en: At first I went to sleep on the bench, but it got cold out there and I came in here.

msg_jp: 風が当たらないだけでもマシだった。
msg_en: Any place was fine as long as it gave me cover from the wind.

msg_jp: 表に出る。
msg_en: I go outside.

msg_jp: 陽が目に差し込み痛い。
msg_en: The sunlight hurts my eyes.

msg_jp: 人の気配がした。
msg_en: I notice somebody near me.

msg_jp: 目を凝らす。
msg_en: I look carefully at them.

msg_jp: 目の前にオレが立っていた。
msg_en: In front of me there is another me.

msg_jp: その不気味さにオレは胸くそ悪くなり、嘔吐しそうになった。
msg_en: It's a sight creepy enough to make me almost throw up.

msg_jp: それほど、『もうひとりのオレがこっちを見ている』、その光景が異常だった。
msg_en: The scene of ❛another self looking at me❜ is that bizarre.

msg_jp: この世界は狂い始めたのか？
msg_en: Is this world starting to go crazy?

msg_jp: `真人@「ひでぇ寝癖だな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You've got terrible bed head.❞

msg_jp: とそいつはオレの声で喋った。
msg_en: The guy before me speaks with my voice.

msg_jp: `真人@「誰だ…てめぇは」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Who the hell... are you?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「見ての通り、井ノ原真人だ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝As you can see, I am Masato Inohara.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「それはオレだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝That's me.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレもそうなんだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝So am I.❞

msg_jp: 声色は冷静だが、明らかにオレを挑発している。
msg_en: His voice sounded calm, although it was obvious that he was provoking me.

msg_jp: やるか…？　やっちまうか…？
msg_en: What should I do...? Should I fight him?

msg_jp: いや、目の前のオレは、オレじゃない。
msg_en: No, this me in front of me, it is not me.

msg_jp: 他人だ。だとすると、簡単に手出しなんてしちゃいけない。
msg_en: It's somebody else, so I should act more cautiously.

msg_jp: そんなものを誇示する必要はもうとっくの昔になくなったんだ。
msg_en: I used to have to display how strong I was, but I'm past that now.

msg_jp: オレは何が起きようとも、冷静でいなくちゃいけない。
msg_en: Whatever happens, I must keep my cool.

msg_jp: オレは、あいつらの日常を守る役目があるからだ。
msg_en: My role is to protect ❛their❜ everyday lives.

msg_jp: こんな奴、最初から見なかったことにしよう。
msg_en: I might as well pretend I never saw this guy before me to begin with.

msg_jp: 無視を決め込んで、その場を後にした。
msg_en: I ignore him and walk past.

msg_jp: 奴は追ってはこなかった。
msg_en: He doesn't follow me.

msg_jp: やはり世界は狂い始めていた。
msg_en: As I thought, the world is getting out of order.

msg_jp: いや、もう、完全に狂いきっている。
msg_en: No, it's already gone completely insane.

msg_jp: オレは呆然と立ちつくす。
msg_en: I stagger on my feet and stop walking.

msg_jp: 今、通り過ぎていった奴は誰だ？
msg_en: Who the hell is it that just passed me by?

msg_jp: …オレに似た誰かだ。
msg_en: ...It was somebody just like me.

msg_jp: 違う、完全にオレだった。
msg_en: No, no mistake about it, it was myself.

msg_jp: 向こうに見える、輪になった集団は？
msg_en: Who are those guys in a circle over there?

msg_jp: 全員オレだ。
msg_en: They are all me.

msg_jp: `真人@「うあああぁぁあああぁぁぁーーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!!❞

msg_jp: オレは威嚇の雄叫びを挙げた。
msg_en: I roar out a threatening cry.

msg_jp: オレが一斉にこちらを向いた。
msg_en: All the other me turn as one to look at me.

msg_jp: オレの目だらけだ。
msg_en: Their eyes all identical to mine in every way.

msg_jp: `真人@「うあああぁぁあああぁぁぁーーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uaaaaaaaahhhhhhhh!!❞

msg_jp: 今度は絶望の叫び声だ。
msg_en: I let out another cry in despair.

msg_jp: 身を翻し、逃げた。
msg_en: Then I turn around and flee.

msg_jp: でも、行く先に待ちかまえているのは、全員オレだ。
msg_en: But all of those I come across are me without any exception.

msg_jp: オレ以外の人間がいない。
msg_en: There is no human being anywhere that isn't me.

msg_jp: 学校の外に出よう。きっとそこにはオレ以外の人間がいるはずだ。
msg_en: I decide to leave the school, believing there must be people who aren't me out there.

msg_jp: 門へと駆けた。
msg_en: I head for the gate.

msg_jp: `真人@「冷静になれよ、真人」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Cool yourself down, Masato.❞

msg_jp: その手前でオレの肩を掴んで、引き留める奴がいた。
msg_en: Just before I reach the gate, somebody stops me.

msg_jp: それももちろんオレだ。
msg_en: Of course... it is me.

msg_jp: `真人@「見てみろ、外に何が見える？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Look out there. What do you see?❞

msg_jp: 門の向こうを見据えた。
msg_en: I stare outside the gate.

msg_jp: 自転車に乗ったオレが通り抜けていった。
msg_en: And I see myself passing by on a bike.

msg_jp: …絶望。
msg_en: ...Despair.

msg_jp: `真人@「なんにも狂っちゃあいない」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Nothing is crazy.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「おまえさえ、冷静でいればな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝So long as you can keep your nerve.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「土日だ、ゆっくり受け入れていけばいい」
msg_en: `Masato@❝It's a weekend. You've got plenty of time to get yourself adjusted to it.❞

msg_jp: オレは固まったまま、動けない。
msg_en: My feet don't move, I just stand rooted in place.

msg_jp: `真人@「ひどいようなら、あの倉庫に戻るといい」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If you can't take it, you can go back to that storeroom.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「あそこには、オレたちは現れない」
msg_en: `Masato@❝None of us show up in there.❞

msg_jp: その手を振り払い、また駆けた。
msg_en: I shake away his hand and take off running again.

msg_jp: そして、倉庫の中に引きこもった。
msg_en: I ended up in the storeroom for all of the weekend.

msg_jp: 月曜、オレはできるだけ景色が見えないように前髪で視界を隠して教室までやってきていた。
msg_en: On Monday, I let my forelocks hang in front of my eyes as I went to the classroom, so that I didn't have to see any of the other me as much as possible.

msg_jp: `真人@「体の調子でも悪いの？」
