msg_en: `Masato@❝Are you feeling ill or something?❞

msg_jp: オレは話しかけられているようだ。
msg_en: Someone seems to be talking to me.

msg_jp: 視界は遮られているが、腰から下を見ただけでわかる。
msg_en: I don't see his face, but I can tell who it is from his lower body alone.

msg_jp: またオレだ。
msg_en: Another me.

msg_jp: `真人@「…またてめぇかよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Not you again.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「もううんざりなんだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I'm freaking sick and tired of you...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「寝てないの…？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Haven't you had any sleep...?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「うんざりなんだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I said I'm sick and tired of you...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「具合悪そうだよ、保健室行こうよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You look horrible. Let's get you to the nurse's office...❞

msg_jp: また、肩に触れられた。あの絶望の瞬間が蘇る。
msg_en: As he touches my shoulder, that despair wells up again.

msg_jp: オレはそれを思いきり手で振り払ってやった。
msg_en: I furiously shake his hand off of me.

msg_jp: しばらくの沈黙の後…
msg_en: After a moment of silence...

msg_jp: `真人@「真人、勝手に席替わってごめん…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Masato, I'm sorry I didn't tell you about changing my seat...❞

msg_jp: そう残して、オレは去っていった。
msg_en: That me gives an apology and leaves.

msg_jp: やはり…こうしたほうが効き目はあるのか…。
msg_en: It seems like... this is still an effective way to get other people to leave me alone.

msg_jp: 賑わう学食は地獄絵図だった。
msg_en: The crowded cafeteria is just a scene from hell.

msg_jp: オレがあんなにも押し合いへし合い…
msg_en: Every inch of the place is full of me...

msg_jp: `真人@「は…はは…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Ha... haha...❞

msg_jp: 誰でもいい。オレじゃない誰か、オレを見つけてくれ。
msg_en: Anybody is fine. Anybody who's not me, please find me.

msg_jp: そして、話しかけてくれ。
msg_en: And talk to me.

msg_jp: ありえねぇぐらいオレは喜ぶから。
msg_en: That alone will make me happy as hell.

msg_jp: ぽん、と肩に手を置かれた。
msg_en: Somebody's hand lands on my shoulder.

msg_jp: 祈りが届いたのか？
msg_en: Did my wish come true?

msg_jp: 振り返る。
msg_en: I turn around.

msg_jp: オレがにやりと笑っていた。
msg_en: There I am, grinning at me.

msg_jp: キレた。
msg_en: I snap.

msg_jp: `真人@「うおおおぉぉぉぉぉーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uooooohhhhhh!❞

msg_jp: 拳を振るった。
msg_en: I throw a punch at him.

msg_jp: バックステップでかわされた。
msg_en: But he steps back and avoids it.

msg_jp: `真人@「じゃあ、こうしようじゃねぇか…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝All right then. I've got it...❞

msg_jp: オレはいいアイデアを思いつく。
msg_en: I came up with a really good idea.

msg_jp: `真人@「強いほうが本物のオレだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝The stronger one will be the real me.❞

msg_jp: ばきぃっ！
msg_en: *Thwack*!

msg_jp: 一発で決まった。
msg_en: I knock him down with a single blow.

msg_jp: 負けたほうのオレが床でのびている。
msg_en: The me who lost is lying on the floor, passed out.

msg_jp: ぞっとする…。
msg_en: I can't help shuddering...

msg_jp: その姿からして、不気味だ…。
msg_en: Seeing myself like that is so creepy...

msg_jp: オレが死んだように、倒れている…。
msg_en: Myself, lying there like a corpse...

msg_jp: そして、オレじゃないオレたちが、しんとなっていた。
msg_en: I notice that none of the other me are talking anymore.

msg_jp: 気づくと、みんなの目がオレを向いていた。
msg_en: They are all looking at me.

msg_jp: たくさんのオレそっくりの目。
msg_en: With eyes just like mine.

msg_jp: `真人@「うああ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uaahh...❞

msg_jp: 頭がおかしくなるっ。
msg_en: I'm about to go over the edge.

msg_jp: また、オレは逃げ出した。
msg_en: Yet again I flee.

msg_jp: またオレはもうひとりのオレと対峙している。
msg_en: And yet again I face another one of myselves.

msg_jp: 一対一なら、オレも正気を保てる。
msg_en: I can keep myself together as long as there is just one of them facing me.

msg_jp: なぜなら、そいつさえ倒せば、オレがオレである証拠となる。
msg_en: Because beating him up is proof that I am the real me.

msg_jp: 強くない井ノ原真人は、すべて偽物だ。
msg_en: The Masato Inoharas who aren't strong are all fakes.

msg_jp: `真人@「みんなが…きみのこと探してたよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Everybody... is looking for you.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「どのオレだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Which me?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「たぶん、きみのことかと」
msg_en: `Masato@❝It's probably you.❞

msg_jp: たぶん？　怪しいな。
msg_en: Probably? He sounded unsure.

msg_jp: `真人@「あ、ほら、後ろ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Ah, look, behind you.❞

msg_jp: その言葉にオレは振り向く。
msg_en: I turn to see what is going on.

msg_jp: 三人のオレがこちらに向かって走ってくる。
msg_en: There are three of myself running toward me.

msg_jp: `真人@「なんだよ、オレを集めればオレに勝てるってかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Huh, d'you think you can get me with numbers...?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレはただひとり、このオレだけだあああぁーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝None of you is me. It is just ME THAT'S ME!!❞

msg_jp: 全員をのしてやった。
msg_en: I knock them all down.

msg_jp: どれだけのしても、奴らはオレに付きまとう…。
msg_en: No matter how many of them I bring down, they won't leave me alone...

msg_jp: 最後にはこの学校にはオレひとりだけが残るんじゃねぇか…。
msg_en: I picture myself doing this until I'm the only one left at this school...

msg_jp: それはおかしいのか？　正しいのか？
msg_en: Is that the wrong way? Or is it the right way?

msg_jp: 感覚が麻痺して、判断ができない…。
msg_en: All my senses are numbed, and I can't make a proper judgement...

msg_jp: そこにふいにオレの声が。
msg_en: Out of the blue, I catch my voice.

msg_jp: `放送@『２年Ｅ組井ノ原真人君以外は校舎前の銅像に近づかないようにしてください。繰り返します…』
msg_en: `Broadcaster@[Attention, all students and staff except for Masato Inohara-kun from class 2-E, please keep clear of the bronze statue in front of the school building. I repeat...]

msg_jp: スピーカー越しの放送の声だ。
msg_en: It's coming from the school building's loudspeakers.

msg_jp: なんだ…？
msg_en: What the hell...?

msg_jp: ２年Ｅ組井ノ原真人はオレしかいない。
msg_en: Masato Inohara from class 2-E, that's me.

msg_jp: 校舎の壁に沿って歩くと、オレをそこへ促す張り紙がずっと貼ってある。
msg_en: I'm walking along the building wall, following signboards.

msg_jp: そこにいけば、ようやく元通りの日常に戻ってくれるのか…？
msg_en: If I reach where they lead me, will my everyday life finally return to the way it was...?

msg_jp: もし、オレ以外のオレが居たとしたら…どうする…。
msg_en: If there's another me waiting over there, what should I do...?

msg_jp: また、のすだけか…。
msg_en: Just kick his ass again...?

msg_jp: 無人だった。
msg_en: There was no one there.

msg_jp: ここでオレは何をすればいい？
msg_en: What am I supposed to do here?

msg_jp: 銅像って言ってたな…。
msg_en: The broadcast mentioned the bronze statue...

msg_jp: その後ろに、仕掛けを発見する。
msg_en: Looking behind it, I find something.

msg_jp: パンチングマシーンのようなものだ。
msg_en: It looks like a punching machine.

msg_jp: `真人@「はっ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hmph...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「これをぶん殴れば…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I smash this down...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「全員消えてくれるのかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Will they all be gone...?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「なら、やってやろうじゃないか…うおりゃああああああぁぁぁぁーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Then, I'll do it... Uooryaaaaaaaaaahhhh!!❞

msg_jp: どごんっ!!
msg_en: *Do-gon*!!

msg_jp: しゃーーーーーっ!!
msg_en: *Shaaaa*!!

msg_jp: `真人@「うおおぉぉぉぉーーーーーーっ!?」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uoooooooohhhhhhh!?❞

msg_jp: ずぅんっ！
msg_en: *Fwoosh*!

msg_jp: 眩しい光が目に差す。なんにも見えない…。
msg_en: A bright light fills my vision, and I can't see anything...

msg_jp: `真人@「眩しい…ライトを消せ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Too bright... Turn off the light...❞

msg_jp: そこに立っているのはもちろんオレだ…。
msg_en: The one standing in front of me is, of course, myself.

msg_jp: 変わるわけねぇ…。
msg_en: I should have realized just punching that shit would change nothing...

msg_jp: `真人@「また、てめぇかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Not you again, damn it...❞

msg_jp: でも、そう吐き捨てずにはいられない…。
msg_en: Yet I cannot help but lash out like this...

msg_jp: その後、右腕が動かないことに気づく。
msg_en: Right after, I notice that my right arm is unmovable.

msg_jp: 何かに貼りついているようだ…。
msg_en: It seems to be stuck to something...

msg_jp: `真人@「なんだよこれ…取れねぇんだが…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What the hell is this thing... It won't come off...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「悪いけど、この中和剤がないと取れないよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Sorry, but you need this neutralizer to get it off.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…何が目的だ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...What do you want?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「真人の暴走を止めるためだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You've been acting crazy, so we came to stop you.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…暴走だと？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...I've been acting crazy?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「はは…てめぇらにはそう見えるのか、そういうふうになってんのか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Haha... is that how you guys see me? Is that how I now look?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「狂ってるのはこの世界だあああーーーーーっ!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝IT'S THIS BLOODY WORLD THAT'S GONE INSANE!!!❞

msg_jp: 一喝すると、オレどもは一目散に逃げた。
msg_en: My other selves flee before my furious roar.

msg_jp: 逃げるなら追ってやろうじゃねぇか。
msg_en: I quickly decide to chase after them.

msg_jp: 右腕にひっついてる何かはやたら重く、引っぱったくらいではびくともしない。
msg_en: The weight on my right arm is so heavy that just pulling doesn't make it budge.

msg_jp: `真人@「はっ、こんなのでオレの動きを封じたつもりかよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Huh, do they think they can stop me with this shit...❞

msg_jp: 右腕で金属の塊をホールドする。
msg_en: I hold onto the huge lump of metal in my right arm.

msg_jp: 腰を落とし全身の力をみなぎらせる。
msg_en: Then I crouch down and draw all my power into the arm.

msg_jp: `真人@「うぉぉぉぉりゃあぁぁぁぁーーーっ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uoooooryaaaaaaahhhhh!❞

msg_jp: 鈍い音を立てて、それは引き抜かれた。
msg_en: With a hollow sound, the statue rises out of the ground.

msg_jp: あとは引っぱれば動くだろう。
msg_en: Guess I can move if I just drag it along.

msg_jp: `真人@「…ちと重いが、動けるようになったぜ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...It's a bit heavy, but now I'm good to go...❞

msg_jp: オレは逃げたオレどもを追いかけた。
msg_en: I start pursuing my two selves.

msg_jp: `真人@「ふっ…ふっ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hoo... Hoo...❞

msg_jp: それでも這うようなスピードしか出ない。
msg_en: Although, I can't move much faster than a crawling worm.

msg_jp: `真人@「このままじゃ、ヤツらに攻撃できねぇじゃねえか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I can't attack them as long as I've got this damn thing.❞

msg_jp: ふと、遠くに光るものを見つけた。
msg_en: Suddenly I glimpse something shining afar.

msg_jp: ふらふらと動くそれはオレを探してるのか。
msg_en: It's swaying; the owner of the light is probably looking for me.

msg_jp: `真人@「…割と近かったよな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Guess I'm not that far from them.❞

msg_jp: 攻撃するなら、アレがいい。
msg_en: I thought up something nice to attack them.

msg_jp: オレはそれを見つけるために、移動を始めた。
msg_en: I head toward my objective.

msg_jp: 体育倉庫のドアを蹴破り、バスケットボールの詰まった籠を引っ張り出す。
msg_en: The door of the P.E. storeroom opens with a single kick, and I drag a casket full of basketballs out of there.

msg_jp: ここからなら中庭が見渡せるし、ヤツらの懐中電灯の光も良く見える。
msg_en: I place myself at a point where I have a good view of the entire courtyard and of the light of my targets.

msg_jp: `真人@「おらぁっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Oryaaahhh!❞

msg_jp: 遠くからオレの驚く声が聞こえた。
msg_en: I can hear the other me's surprised yelp from a distance.

msg_jp: 左手で掴み、そのまま投げつける。
msg_en: I grab another ball and let it fly.

msg_jp: `真人@「うらぁっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Urah!❞

msg_jp: さすがに利き腕じゃなきゃ、そう当たらないか…。
msg_en: My aim isn't too good with my left hand...

msg_jp: `真人@「おらぁっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Orah!❞

msg_jp: 鈍い音が響いた。
msg_en: This time I hear a dull thud.

msg_jp: よし、今のは当たったな。
msg_en: All right, that one hit one of them.

msg_jp: だが、影は一瞬動きを止めただけで、そのまま逃げようとする。
msg_en: However, they merely pause for a second before trying to run again.

msg_jp: `真人@「…一発でのされておきゃあ楽なものを」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...You should've let yourself get knocked down with that shot.❞

msg_jp: オレはさらにバスケットボールを掴み、全力で投げつけた。
msg_en: I grip another ball and hurl it toward them with all my might.

msg_jp: と、懐中電灯の光が見えなくなった。
msg_en: In the next instant, their light is gone.

msg_jp: `真人@「気付きやがったか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Dammit, they noticed it.❞

msg_jp: 籠を捨てて、追いかける。
msg_en: Giving up on the rest of the balls, I quickly switch to pursuing them.

msg_jp: `真人@「どこだ、おらあぁぁーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Where the hell are you! Goddammit!❞

msg_jp: 全速力。
msg_en: I'm running as fast as I can.

msg_jp: …息が荒い。
msg_en: ...My breathing is so heavy.

msg_jp: さすがに疲れてきた。
msg_en: Despite all my training, I'm still getting tired.

msg_jp: 戦いは長いんだ。
msg_en: It's going to be a long fight.

msg_jp: オレは休息を取るために、座り込んだ。
msg_en: I crouch down to rest a little.

msg_jp: `真人@「真人」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Masato.❞

msg_jp: オレが目の前に立つ。
msg_en: Another me is standing in front of me.

msg_jp: `真人@「現れやがったか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝So you showed up.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「待って、もう疲れてるでしょ？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Keep sitting. You must be really tired.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「いいや」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Not at all.❞

msg_jp: 弱音を吐くほど、オレはまだ落ちぶれちゃない。
msg_en: I hadn't yet stooped so low as to whine aloud.

msg_jp: `真人@「僕には…もう、真人に勝ち目は…ない気がするんだ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I feel like... you already have no more chance... to win against us...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「これ以上はやりあいたくないっていうか…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I don't really feel like continuing this anymore...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「は、笑わせるな。そんなのてめぇの逃げ口上じゃねぇか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Hah, don't make me laugh. That's just your freaking escape line.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「逃げるなら逃げろ。その代わり二度と現れるな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If you wanna flee, then do it. However, don't you ever show me that face again.❞

msg_jp: オレがオレを睨みつける。
msg_en: I glare at the other me.

msg_jp: もう見たくない。
msg_en: I don't want to see any more of them.

msg_jp: `真人@「…真人、悪いけど、次はやるよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Sorry, Masato, but I'll get you with the next one.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「ああ…望むところだ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Sure... Bring it on.❞

msg_jp: オレが去っていく。
msg_en: The other me turns away.

msg_jp: 全速力で追いかけたが、奴の方が速い。
msg_en: I try to catch up with him at full speed, but he is still faster than me.

msg_jp: いろんなものに銅像を引っ掛け、無駄に体力を使ってしまった。
msg_en: On top of that, I have unnecessarily exhausted myself on the way here because of the burden of the statue.

msg_jp: 次が最後の勝負だ。
msg_en: My next encounter with them will probably be the last.

msg_jp: こんなもん引きずって戦ったら、勝てるわけがない。
msg_en: How can I fight and win with this huge and heavy thing on my arm?

msg_jp: 場所を教えているようなもんだしな。
msg_en: On top of everything, it's telling the opponents my whereabouts.

msg_jp: `真人@「…しかたねぇか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...I've got no choice.❞

msg_jp: 力を篭めろ。
msg_en: I muster up all of my strength.
`Masato@❝Haah.........!❞

msg_jp: 声にならない声を出し、俺は全身の力を一点に集めた。
msg_en: Letting out a muted shout, I concentrate the power into one point of my body at a time.

msg_jp: 腕から背中に、背中から足腰に。
msg_en: From the arms to the back, then from the back to the legs and feet.

msg_jp: ぐらり、と重さを失ったそれは、次第にオレの肩へと上がっていく。
msg_en: The statue gradually loses its weight and I hoist it onto my shoulder.

msg_jp: 反動を押さえ込め。
msg_en: I grit my teeth to endure the backlash.

msg_jp: これくらい簡単だ。
msg_en: No problem.

msg_jp: オーケー。もうこれで跡は残らねぇ。
msg_en: Okay, no more drag marks.

msg_jp: オレは銅像を背負って歩き出した。
msg_en: I begin walking with the statue on my shoulder.

msg_jp: オレは小走りに校舎の影に入った。
msg_en: The shadow of the school building invites me.

msg_jp: 案の定、向こうではオレが慌てている。
msg_en: As expected, I find both the other me flustered over yonder.

msg_jp: 死角から足音を立てないようにそっと近づいていく。
msg_en: Without making a sound, I draw closer to them from their blind spot.

msg_jp: `真人@「ぅおらああぁぁーっっ!!!」
msg_en: `Masato@❝UORAAAAAAHH!!!❞

msg_jp: どずんっっ!!
msg_en: *CRASH*!!

msg_jp: 銅像の重みも上乗せした力でぶん殴ってやった。
msg_en: I throw a blow heavy with the added weight of the bronze statue.

msg_jp: ちっ、はずしたか。
msg_en: Damn, I missed.

msg_jp: 重さでいつものスピードがでない。
msg_en: The extra weight makes me slower than usual.

msg_jp: まあいい、一発当たれば終わるからな。
msg_en: But it doesn't really matter; if I can hit them just once, they will definitely be defeated.

msg_jp: `真人@「おわっ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Owah!❞

msg_jp: 投げつけられた何かに一瞬だけ怯む。
msg_en: Something they threw made me pause for just a second.

msg_jp: その隙に奴らは逃げ出してしまった。
msg_en: Meanwhile, they manage to slip away again.

msg_jp: `真人@「まてやぁっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Wait the hell up!❞

msg_jp: ちっ、見失ったか…。
msg_en: Shit, I lost track of them...

msg_jp: ここは…北校舎か。
msg_en: Looking around... I am next to the north building.

msg_jp: どこいきやがったんだ…。
msg_en: Where the hell did they go...

msg_jp: `真人@「真人！　どこにいるんだ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Masato! Where are you!❞

msg_jp: 遠くから声がした。
msg_en: I hear one of them calling me from afar.

msg_jp: 逃げ回ってるくせに、挑発までしやがるとは。
msg_en: How dare he taunt me like that while running away.

msg_jp: `真人@「僕はここだよ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I'm right here!❞

msg_jp: ちくしょう、行ってやるよ。
msg_en: Goddammit, I'll be right over.

msg_jp: `真人@「ちっ、こそこそと逃げ回りやがって…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Dammit, running around so sneakily...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレなら正々堂々と戦いやがれ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If it's me, he should just fight fair and square...❞

msg_jp: なんて情けねぇオレだ…。
msg_en: What an utterly disappointing me...

msg_jp: 断然オレのほうが強いぜ…。
msg_en: It's obvious I'm way stronger than him...

msg_jp: `真人@「こっちだよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Over here.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「待ちやがれ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Stop right there!❞

msg_jp: 重さに振り回される。
msg_en: The statue stops me from moving as I please.

msg_jp: もう逃げる奴を追いかける体力はない。
msg_en: I'm already too tired to pursue the running enemies.

msg_jp: ついにオレは座り込んでしまった…。
msg_en: Eventually, I'm forced to sit down on the ground...

msg_jp: 遠くからオレを呼ぶ声がする。
msg_en: Somebody is hailing me from a distance.

msg_jp: オレは最強なんだ…。
msg_en: I am the strongest...

msg_jp: 立ち上がるんだ…。
msg_en: I have to stand up...

msg_jp: 荒れた息はもう戻らない。
msg_en: I haven't had enough time to get rid of my heavy breathing.

msg_jp: ありったけの力を集めて、銅像をひっぱりながら声の方向へと向かう。
msg_en: I trudge toward the owner of the voice, pulling the statue with all my remaining power.

msg_jp: 遠くに見えるオレが何か言っていた。
msg_en: I see one of the other me saying something in the distance.

msg_jp: `真人@「…るせぇ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Shaddap.❞

msg_jp: もう黙れよ。
msg_en: Shut your mouth already.

msg_jp: `真人@「真人…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Masato...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「るせぇんだよ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Shut the hell up!❞

msg_jp: 怒りが、オレを奮い立たせた。
msg_en: Wrath drags me to my feet.

msg_jp: あれほど重かったはずの銅像が、簡単に持ち上がるぜ。
msg_en: The statue suddenly feels so light that I don't have to drag my feet anymore.

msg_jp: `真人@「勝負だ。もう逃げんじゃねえぞ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Time for a real battle. Don't even think of running anymore.❞

msg_jp: 一歩ずつヤツに近寄っていく。
msg_en: Step by step, I approach him.

msg_jp: 逃げる気配はなかった。
msg_en: It doesn't feel like he's going to sprint away now.

msg_jp: ついに観念したか…？
msg_en: I wonder if he's finally ready...
`Masato@❝!?❞

msg_jp: 何かがオレを覆っていた。
msg_en: Something suddenly covers me.

msg_jp: `真人@「やった！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Score!❞

msg_jp: `真人@「理樹、今だ、いけ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Riki! Now's your chance, go!❞

msg_jp: どむっ。
msg_en: *Ka-thunk*.

msg_jp: うっ…。
msg_en: Uu...

msg_jp: 一瞬、崩れ落ちそうになる。
msg_en: I almost fall down to the ground.

msg_jp: でも負けるわけにはいかねぇんだよ…。
msg_en: But I can't lose to them...

msg_jp: `真人@「うおりゃーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uoryaaaahhhh!!!❞

msg_jp: オレを絡め取るよくわからないものを切り裂いてやった。
msg_en: I tear the unknown obstacle restricting me apart.

msg_jp: 奴は、ようやく構えをとった。
msg_en: At last, the one before me takes up a fighting stance.

msg_jp: `真人@「…ほう、ようやくその気になったか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...Good, we're finally on the same page.❞

msg_jp: 何度目のタックルを受けたろう？
msg_en: How many tackles have I gotten from him?

msg_jp: 強ぇな…。
msg_en: To think he was so strong...

msg_jp: 何度となく地面に、壁にと叩きつけてやった。
msg_en: I have slammed him over and over to the ground, to the wall.

msg_jp: それでも、立ち上がってくる。
msg_en: Yet, he keeps standing up and coming at me.

msg_jp: 他の奴らとは違い、こいつだけは根性がある。
msg_en: Unlike the others before, this guy sure has guts.

msg_jp: 今までの中で一番オレに近いオレだ。
msg_en: He is much more similar to me than any of the other me I have encountered.

msg_jp: その姿がオレでなかったらわかりあえてたかもな。
msg_en: If he didn't look the way he did, we could probably have made good friends.

msg_jp: だが残念なことに、おまえはオレの偽物だ。
msg_en: But, what a shame. In the end, he's just a fake.

msg_jp: オレがオレであるために、おまえをぜってぇ倒す。
msg_en: To keep myself as myself, I definitely have to beat him.

msg_jp: がつ。
msg_en: *Thud*.

msg_jp: そこへ、突然の衝撃がオレの肩を襲った。
msg_en: Out of the blue, a light impact strikes my shoulder.

msg_jp: 軽い。まったく効きはしない。
msg_en: It was too light to hurt me one bit.

msg_jp: だがそれはなんだ？　何が降ってきたんだ？
msg_en: But what was it? What was it that just fell down onto me?

msg_jp: オレはそれを見極めようと、目を凝らした。
msg_en: To ascertain what it was, I turn to look.

msg_jp: オレじゃない奴がいた！
msg_en: There is somebody that's not me!

msg_jp: おい、鈴、オレだ、わかるか！
msg_en: Hey, Rin! It's me, don't you recognize me!

msg_jp: 夢中で手を伸ばした。
msg_en: I desperately reach out toward her.
...Rin!

msg_jp: オレがオレだと教えて…
msg_en: I want you to tell me that I am myself...

msg_jp: どむ。
msg_en: *Thump*.

msg_jp: `真人@「おぇっ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Oe...❞

msg_jp: レバーに入った。
msg_en: A tackle gets me straight in the liver.

msg_jp: そこにオレがいた。
msg_en: There's another me there.

msg_jp: 今まで戦い続けてきたオレだ。
msg_en: The one who had kept on fighting.

msg_jp: ずっと逃げ回っていたほうのオレだ。
msg_en: The one who had kept running around.

msg_jp: そっちのオレのほうが…強いというのか？
msg_en: Is this me... stronger than I?

msg_jp: なら、オレは誰だ？
msg_en: Then, who the hell am I?

msg_jp: オレじゃなくなる…。
msg_en: I'll be someone that's not me...

msg_jp: 堪えきれない…。
msg_en: I can't take it...

msg_jp: 意識が飛ぶ。
msg_en: I'm about to pass out.

msg_jp: ああ、まだ消えるな景色よ。
msg_en: I put all I have into keeping my eyes open.

msg_jp: 空を見据えろ。
msg_en: I force myself to stare up at the sky,

msg_jp: それが消えたら終わりだぞ。
msg_en: telling myself that if I look, I'll be gone.

msg_jp: オレはお終いだぞ。
msg_en: I will be over.

msg_jp: オレより強い奴らといったら、年上でしかありえない。
msg_en: If there is someone stronger than me, it definitely has to be someone older than me too.

msg_jp: 自分より年上で、若い連中が集まる場所へと赴いた。
msg_en: I used to frequent places where crowds of youngsters older than myself hung out.

msg_jp: けど、そこで待っていたのは、またあの『嘲笑』だ。
msg_en: However, what awaited me there was the same old sneering.

msg_jp: 『なんだこのちっせぇ生意気なの、誰が連れてきたんだ？』
msg_en: ❛Who the hell is that sassy brat? Who brought him here?❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『きたねぇ服…ボロボロだぜ』
msg_en: ❛Look at what he's wearing... Those rags are so shabby.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: 『顔もきたねぇし、憎たらしいっツラしてんな』
msg_en: ❛Your face's so dirty, it pisses me off.❜

msg_jp: 嘲笑…
msg_en: Sneering...

msg_jp: だから、オレはまた強さを誇示した。
msg_en: Thus, I had to show them how strong I was.

msg_jp: また、誰も笑わなくなった。
msg_en: And nobody, like before, laughed at me anymore.

msg_jp: オレの居場所はここでもないんだ。
msg_en: That had not been the place for me, either.

msg_jp: オレは、さらに先へ先へと進んだ。
msg_en: I went further and further.

msg_jp: 悪ぶった奴らに絡まれるようなこともやって回った。
msg_en: I even did a lot of stuff that pissed off some bad crowds.

msg_jp: そんな奴らを相手にしても負け知らずだった。
msg_en: Yet none of them could ever beat me.

msg_jp: その時になってようやく不安を覚え始めた。
msg_en: It was around that point I had finally started feeling worried about something.

msg_jp: オレは馬鹿だったから、忘れていたんだ。
msg_en: I had been so stupid that I forgot.

msg_jp: オレはなんのために強くなったんだ？
msg_en: What was it that I had become strong for?

msg_jp: 何を求めていたんだ？
msg_en: What was it that I had longed for?

msg_jp: あの日から何を探し始めたんだ？
msg_en: What was it that I had sought ever since that day?

msg_jp: 長いこと忘れていた。
msg_en: For years I had never stopped to think about it.

msg_jp: だけど、オレは強くなりすぎた。
msg_en: But now, I had made myself too strong.

msg_jp: それはどうやらもう、手に入らないらしい。
msg_en: Whatever it was, it seemed to be too late to get it.

msg_jp: 『井ノ原だ、逃げろっ』
msg_en: ❛It's Inohara! Run!❜

msg_jp: 孤独…
msg_en: Isolation...

msg_jp: 『あの子に近づいちゃ駄目っ』
msg_en: ❛You have to stay away from that boy!❜

msg_jp: 孤独…
msg_en: Isolation...

msg_jp: 『誰かあいつを止めるんだっ』
msg_en: ❛Won't somebody stop him!❜

msg_jp: 孤独…
msg_en: Isolation...

msg_jp: `少年@「おまえが井ノ原か？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Are you Inohara?❞

msg_jp: そいつは現れた。
msg_en: And then he appeared in front of me.

msg_jp: 塀の上、颯爽と太陽の光を背に、まるでどこかのお話に出てくる救世主のようだった。
msg_en: There he stood on the fence, the sunlight on his back, just like a savior.

msg_jp: オレはといえば、喧嘩を終えた直後で、泥だらけで、服も破けてて…まるで救いを求める乞食のようだ。
msg_en: On the other hand, I, who had just finished a brawl, was covered in mud, my clothes in tatters... I looked just like a beggar.

msg_jp: `真人@「おまえが新しい挑戦者か？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Are you a new challenger?❞

msg_jp: `少年@「ああ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I am.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「やめとけ、そんなひょろい体じゃ勝負にならねぇよ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Think again. Somebody stringy like you can't stand up to me.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「…これでもか？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝...Can you say that again after this?❞

msg_jp: そいつが片手を振った。
msg_en: The boy threw his hand in the air.

msg_jp: どおぉぉぉぉぉおーーーーーーんっ!!
msg_en: *Doooooong*!!

msg_jp: オレの背中で爆風が上がった。
msg_en: Something exploded; I felt a sharp blast behind me.

msg_jp: いしつぶてが背中にいくつも当たる。
msg_en: A shower of small stones hit my back.

msg_jp: `真人@「はは…おもしれぇ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Haha... interesting.❞

msg_jp: オレは武者震いをした。
msg_en: Excitement made my body tremble.

msg_jp: `真人@「相手してやろうじゃねぇか」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Bring it on.❞

msg_jp: 戦いが始まった。
msg_en: Our fight commenced.

msg_jp: どおぉぉぉぉぉおーーーーーーんっ!!
msg_en: *Doooooooooooooooooong*!!

msg_jp: すぐそばで爆風が上がり、オレの体は吹き飛ばされる。
msg_en: Another explosion blew me off my feet.

msg_jp: `真人@「ちっ、いくつ仕掛けてあんだよっ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Dammit, how many bombs does he have!❞

msg_jp: 転げた後、立ち上がる。
msg_en: I rolled on the ground and jumped to my feet.

msg_jp: こんな戦い、初めてだ。
msg_en: I had never experienced this kind of fight before.

msg_jp: 喧嘩なんてレベルじゃなく、まさしく戦いだ。
msg_en: No, this was way more than a mere fight; this was nothing short of a serious battle.

msg_jp: もうもうと上がる煙の中に、奴の影を見つける。
msg_en: I could see his figure in the thin smoke.

msg_jp: あの細い体なら、一発でのせる。
msg_en: He was so skinny, just one blow should be enough to take him down.

msg_jp: 触れられさえすれば、それでお終いだ。
msg_en: Once he was in my reach, he would be through.

msg_jp: 一気に距離を詰める。
msg_en: I quickly closed in on him.

msg_jp: `真人@「うおりゃああああぁぁぁーーーーっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Uoryaaaaaahhhhhh!❞

msg_jp: 渾身のフック。
msg_en: I threw a powerful right hook.

msg_jp: 決まりだ。
msg_en: That should've ended it.
`Masato@❝...!?❞

msg_jp: 奴の重心は右にも左にもかかってなかったはずなのに、ひらりとかわされた。
msg_en: Although he had been leaning his center of gravity neither to the left nor right, he dodged my fist effortlessly.

msg_jp: …すばやさだけはあるようだな。
msg_en: ...In other words, he was quicker than I had thought.

msg_jp: でも、大振りさえしなければ当たる。
msg_en: Yet I should be able to hit him if I shortened my swing.

msg_jp: 速いストレートで顎を打ち抜く。それだけでいい。
msg_en: All I had to do was throw a quick straight at his chin, and that would end it.

msg_jp: オレは向きを変え、もう一度その影を真正面に見据える。
msg_en: I turned again to face his figure.

msg_jp: 地を蹴って、最速のストレートをお見舞いした。
msg_en: Kicking off the ground, I shot my fastest straight.

msg_jp: ガコンッ！
msg_en: *Go-kon*!

msg_jp: 入った。
msg_en: My fist connected with

msg_jp: 手が何かの中に。
msg_en: something.

msg_jp: 固ぇ…なんだ、これは…。
msg_en: It's hard... What the hell is this...

msg_jp: 風がびゅうと吹き、煙幕が払われていく。
msg_en: A gust of wind blew the smoke away.

msg_jp: 手の先が露わになる。
msg_en: What my hand was in became visible.

msg_jp: オレの腕の先は…ポストの中に消えていた。
msg_en: It was... inside a mailbox.

msg_jp: 投函口にだ。こんなところに人の手が入るものなのか？
msg_en: My hand was stuck in its mouth... Was it even possible to get your hand inside?

msg_jp: 抜こうとした。手首から先がどうしても抜けなかった。
msg_en: I tried to pull it out, but the mouth was too narrow for my hand to pass through.

msg_jp: `少年@「無駄だ、抜けやしねーよ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝That's a waste of time. You can't get it out.❞

msg_jp: その上に奴はすかした顔のまんまで立っていた。
msg_en: He stood atop the box, laughing victoriously.

msg_jp: `少年@「そういう『細工』をしてあるんだ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I did a small job on the mouth so that your hand can get in but not out.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「さて、次の回収は何時ぐらいだろう？　その時、郵便局員はおまえを見てどう思うかな？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Well, when will they come collect the mail here next, I wonder? And what will they do when they see you?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレは…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I am the...❞

msg_jp: もう一方の手を、ポストの下に回す。
msg_en: I held onto the bottom of the mailbox with my free hand.

msg_jp: 腰に力を入れる。土が盛り上がった。
msg_en: I put all my strength into my lower back. The earth underneath the box gave way.

msg_jp: `真人@「最強だあああぁぁぁぁぁーーーーーーっっ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...strongeeeeeeeeeeeest!❞

msg_jp: そのまま解き放った。
msg_en: I pulled the box free of the ground.

msg_jp: 奴が転げ落ちる。いいざまだ！
msg_en: The boy fell down - what a lovely sight!

msg_jp: `少年@「こいつはたまげたぜ…」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Holy crap...❞

msg_jp: 立ち上がり、土埃を払う。
msg_en: He stood up and dusted himself off.

msg_jp: `少年@「だが、片手を使えない状態で何ができる？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝But what can you do with just one hand?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「できるさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Watch me...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「てめぇをボコボコにするぐらい片腕で十分だぜ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I can at least beat you up.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「予想外の展開だ…ポスト抱えて戦う奴なんて初めてだぜ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝This is beyond my expectations... I've never seen anyone fight wearing a mailbox on their hand.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「これで終わりか？」
msg_en: `Masato@❝You out of tricks now?❞

msg_jp: `少年@「ああ、もう手はない」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Yeah, no more tricks.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「仕方がない。数発は覚悟しとくか」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I have no choice. I'll risk a couple punches.❞

msg_jp: 言うと、奴は初めて身構えた。
msg_en: With that, he took a fighting stance for the first time since our fight started.

msg_jp: `真人@「数百発だ！」
msg_en: `Masato@❝No, you'll get a couple hundred!❞

msg_jp: ぶぅん！
msg_en: *Phwoo*!

msg_jp: …しゅっ！
msg_en: ...*Zhup*!

msg_jp: ババキィッ！
msg_en: *Ka-chank*!

msg_jp: クロスカウンターを皮切りに…壮絶な殴り合いが始まった。
msg_en: With a fierce cross counter... our battle began.

msg_jp: まぶたが腫れ上がって、もうなんも見えやしねぇ…。
msg_en: Both of my eyelids were so puffed up I couldn't see anything anymore...

msg_jp: 掴んで殴り続けておけばいいものの、握力もなくなり、さっき振り切られた。
msg_en: I could still have kept holding and hitting him, but my grip had weakened and he got off me earlier.

msg_jp: 今はもう、一方的に殴られるだけだ。
msg_en: Now, unable to do anything, I was just being one-sidedly beaten by him.

msg_jp: `少年@「なんで、おまえ倒れねーんだ？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Why won't you fall down?❞

msg_jp: その手が止まっていた。
msg_en: He stopped hitting me.

msg_jp: `真人@「それはオレがおまえより強ぇからだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝That's because I am stronger than you...❞

msg_jp: `少年@「でも、もう目も見えねーし、このまま続ければ負けるぜ？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝But you can't even see anymore. You're definitely gonna lose if we go on.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「いや…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Nope...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレはぜってぇ倒れねぇ…だから負けもしねぇんだよ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I won't ever go down... So I won't lose, either...❞

msg_jp: `少年@「そいつはつらいな」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝That must be so hard for you.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「楽にしてやるよ。ほら、倒れろよ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I'll free you from it. Now, just fall down.❞

msg_jp: どすっ！
msg_en: *Punch*.

msg_jp: `真人@「ぜってー倒れねぇ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I never will...❞

msg_jp: `少年@「なんでだよ？　何をがんばってんだよ、おまえひとりで」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Why not? What are you struggling for, all by yourself?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「そりゃがんばるさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Of course, I'm struggling...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「おまえの言うとおり…オレはひとりだからな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Because, as you just said... I'm alone.❞

msg_jp: `真人@「がんばらなくちゃさ…みじめで仕方がねぇじゃねぇか…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I stop struggling... I can't take this miserable feeling...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「馬鹿だったオレがさ…あの日から、体を鍛え始めてさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I was stupid... But I started to train myself since that day...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレを笑う奴はいなくなったけどさ…それでもひとりきりでさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝And no one laughs at me anymore... Even so, I'm still alone...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「それでも、求め続けてさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝But still, I've kept looking...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「探し続けてさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I've been looking for something...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「でもいつからか、わかんなくなっちまってさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝But for some time now, I haven't even known what it is anymore...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「オレは…いったい何のためにがんばってんだっけ…てさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I don't know... what the heck it is I've been struggling for...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「探してたものはなんだったっけ…てさ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What the heck it is I've been looking for...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「だから、それを強さにしたんだ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝So I decided that what I want is to become strong...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「それを誇示し続けることにしたんだ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝What I want is to show off my strength...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「だから、倒れるわけにはいかねぇんだ…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝That's why... I cannot go down...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「負けちまったら、オレはただの馬鹿にもどっちまうからな…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝If I lose, I'll turn back to being just an idiot...❞

msg_jp: `真人@「そんなみじめなことにならねぇためにな…」
msg_en: `Masato@❝I don't wanna let such a miserable thing happen...❞

msg_jp: `少年@「おまえがみじめかどうかはおまえが決めることだから、そいつはどうにもできないが…」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I can't do anything about whether you feel miserable or not, since it's you that decides it...❞

msg_jp: `少年@「馬鹿でもいいじゃねーか」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝But isn't it okay to be an idiot?❞

msg_jp: `少年@「強くなくたってもいいじゃねーか」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I don't think you need to be strong.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「俺は、おまえと戦えて、すげー楽しかった」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝To me, just fighting you was so much fun.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「こんな無茶できるやつなんてどこにもいねーぜ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝I'm sure there's no one else out there as crazy as you.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「ポスト抱えて戦う馬鹿なんてさ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝Where else can you find an idiot who fights with his hand in a mailbox?❞

msg_jp: `少年@「だから、そのまんまでいてくれよ」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝So I want you to stay the way you are.❞

msg_jp: `少年@「だったら、俺はこれからもずっとおまえと一緒に遊ぶぜ。すんげー楽しかったからな」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝If you do, I'll play with you from now on, because I just had a lot of fun with you.❞

msg_jp: 不覚にも…
msg_en: Tears...

msg_jp: 涙が出そうだった。
msg_en: almost came out of my eyes.

msg_jp: そうか…
msg_en: And that time was when I realized...

msg_jp: ずっと…
msg_en: Ever since that long-gone day...

msg_jp: あの日からずっと探していたものはこれだったんだ。
msg_en: What I'd been looking for ever since that day was all here.

msg_jp: `少年@「下の名前は？」
msg_en: `Young Boy@❝What's your first name?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「真人」
msg_en: `Masato@❝Masato.❞

msg_jp: `恭介@「俺は棗恭介だ」
msg_en: `Kyousuke@❝I'm Kyousuke Natsume.❞

msg_jp: `恭介@「真人、今日から俺とおまえは友達だ」
msg_en: `Kyousuke@❝Masato, we're friends from today.❞

msg_jp: もう手に入らないと思っていたものを…そいつは簡単に差し出してくれたんだ。
msg_en: Something I'd thought I would never get my hands on... he offered it to me so easily.

msg_jp: `恭介@「これからは楽しいことがたくさん待ってるぜ」
msg_en: `Kyousuke@❝And we will have a lot of fun together from this moment on.❞

msg_jp: `恭介@「だから、今は休んでおけ。な」
msg_en: `Kyousuke@❝So you can take some rest for now, all right?❞

msg_jp: もう恐れることはねぇんだ…。
msg_en: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore...

msg_jp: 自然に力が抜け、オレは倒れた。
msg_en: Without my consent or will, all the strength left my body and I collapsed onto the ground.

msg_jp: 体は、どこもかしこも痛ぇのに…
msg_en: Even though my entire body was killing me...

msg_jp: なんてすがすがしいんだろう。
msg_en: I felt so very alive.

msg_jp: 風が吹く。
msg_en: A wind blew.

msg_jp: りん、と鈴の音が聞こえる。
msg_en: I heard Rin's bell chime.

msg_jp: あの時と同じだ。
msg_en: It was the same that day as it is now.

msg_jp: オレは目を閉じる。
msg_en: I closed my eyes.

msg_jp: やっと見つけたんだ。
msg_en: I had finally found

msg_jp: オレの居場所を。
msg_en: the place where I belong.

msg_jp: あいつがくれたんだ。
msg_en: He had given it to me.

msg_jp: そこではどんな馬鹿をやってもよかったんだ。
msg_en: Whatever silly stuff I did, it didn't matter at all there.

msg_jp: あいつは爽快に笑い飛ばしてくれたんだ。
msg_en: He always laughed it off.

msg_jp: その度、俺も笑う。
msg_en: And I laughed too.

msg_jp: そんな場所なんだ。
msg_en: It was that kind of place.

msg_jp: 失いたくないんだ。
msg_en: I did not want to lose it.

msg_jp: `理樹@「大丈夫だよ…」
msg_en: `Riki@❝No worries...❞

msg_jp: その声は理樹だった。
msg_en: It was Riki.

msg_jp: `理樹@「なんにも恐れることなんてない」
msg_en: `Riki@❝There's nothing at all to fear.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「どんな真人でも…真人は僕の大切な友達だよ」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Whatever you do, Masato... you are my irreplaceable friend.❞

msg_jp: その言葉は…
msg_en: Those words of his...

msg_jp: オレにとって一番大切なものだ。
msg_en: meant all the world to me.

msg_jp: おまえはそれを、もう一度オレにくれるのか？
msg_en: Are you sure you want to give them to me again?

msg_jp: 負けてしまったオレに？
msg_en: Don't you mind that I lost?

msg_jp: ついていっていいのか？
msg_en: Can I really stay with you?

msg_jp: 俺の馬鹿を笑い飛ばしてくれるのか？
msg_en: Will you laugh off every stupid thing I might do?

msg_jp: 一緒に笑ってくれるのか？
msg_en: Will you laugh with me?

msg_jp: なら…答えてくれ。
msg_en: If so... answer my question.

msg_jp: `真人@「…これからは…楽しいことがたくさん待ってんのかな」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...From now on... will we have a lot of fun times?❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「もちろん」
msg_en: `Riki@❝Sure.❞

msg_jp: `理樹@「だから、今はもう休もう。ね」
msg_en: `Riki@❝So let's take a rest for now, all right?❞

msg_jp: `真人@「…ああ」
msg_en: `Masato@❝...'Kay.❞

msg_jp: 理樹…
msg_en: Riki...

msg_jp: よくやってくれた。
msg_en: You really did an awesome job.

msg_jp: オレはもう満足だ。
msg_en: I couldn't be any happier.

msg_jp: 頑張れよな…
msg_en: Keep yourself going...

msg_jp: これからも。
msg_en: Even after this.

msg_jp: オレも最後のその時までは付き合うからな。
msg_en: I will also stick with you until the last moment comes.
